  3205                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3206                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3207                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3208                                  
  3209                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3210                                  
  3211                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3212                                  ;
  3213                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3214                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3215                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3216                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3217                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3218                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3219                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3220                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3221                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3222                                  ;
  3223                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3224                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3225                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3226                                  ;
  3227                                  ;	uses:	
  3228                                  ;
  3229                                  ;
  3230                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3231                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3232                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3233                                  ;
  3234                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3235                                  
  3236                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3237                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3238                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3239                                  
  3240                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3241                                  
  3242                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3243                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3244                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3245                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3246                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3247                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3248                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3249                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3250                                  
  3251                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3252                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3253                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3254                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3255                                  
  3256                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3257 000012DC 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3258 000012DF 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3259 000012E1 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3260 000012E4 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3261 000012E6 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3262 000012E9 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3263                                  atd1:
  3264 000012EB 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3265                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3266                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3267                                  
  3268                                  atd2:					
  3269 000012F0 53                      		push	bx
  3270 000012F1 51                      		push	cx
  3271 000012F2 52                      		push	dx
  3272 000012F3 57                      		push	di
  3273 000012F4 1E                      		push	ds
  3274 000012F5 06                      		push	es
  3275 000012F6 50                      		push	ax
  3276 000012F7 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3277                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3278 000012FA 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3279                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3280 000012FC C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3281                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3282                                  					; initially no error code.
  3283 00001301 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3284 00001304 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3285                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3286 00001308 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3287                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3288 0000130A C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3289 0000130F EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3290                                  					; return
  3291                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3292                                  
  3293                                  atd3:					
  3294 00001311 53                      		push	bx
  3295 00001312 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3296 00001314 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3297 00001317 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3298 00001319 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3299 0000131B 5B                      		pop	bx
  3300 0000131C 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3301 0000131F 0E                      		push	cs
  3302 00001320 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3303 00001323 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3304 00001325 58                      		pop	ax
  3305 00001326 50                      		push	ax
  3306 00001327 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3307 0000132A BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3308 0000132D EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3309 0000132E E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3310                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3311                                  
  3312                                  atd4:	
  3313                                  
  3314                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3315                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3316                                  				
  3317 00001331 58                      		pop	ax
  3318                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3319 00001332 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3320 00001336 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3321 00001338 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3322 0000133A F9                      		stc
  3323                                  atd5:					
  3324 0000133B 07                      		pop	es
  3325 0000133C 1F                      		pop	ds
  3326 0000133D 5F                      		pop	di
  3327 0000133E 5A                      		pop	dx
  3328 0000133F 59                      		pop	cx
  3329 00001340 5B                      		pop	bx
  3330 00001341 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3331                                  
  3332                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3333                                  
  3334                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3335                                  ;
  3336                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3337                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3338                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3339                                  ;	
  3340                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3341                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3342                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3343                                  ;
  3344                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3345                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3346                                  ;
  3347                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3348                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3349                                  
  3350                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3351                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3352                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3353 00001344 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3354                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3355 00001347 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3356 0000134C 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3357 0000134F 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3358 00001351 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3359                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3360                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3361                                  setc1:					
  3362 00001356 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3363 00001358 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3364                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3365                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3366 0000135A A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3367 0000135D 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3368 00001361 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3369 00001363 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3370                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3371 00001366 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3372 00001369 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3373 0000136B C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3374 0000136E 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3375 00001371 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3376 00001373 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3377                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3378 00001375 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3379 00001378 06                      		push	es
  3380 00001379 53                      		push	bx
  3381 0000137A 0E                      		push	cs
  3382 0000137B E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3383 0000137E 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3384                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3385 00001382 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3386                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3387 00001385 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3388                                  					; only use low part
  3389 00001388 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3390                                  					; control byte modifier
  3391 0000138C 5B                      		pop	bx
  3392 0000138D 07                      		pop	es
  3393                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3394 0000138E 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3395 00001392 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3396 00001395 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3397                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3398 00001397 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3399 0000139B C3                      		retn
  3400                                  
  3401                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3402                                  
  3403                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3404                                  ;
  3405                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3406                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3407                                  ;
  3408                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3409                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3410                                  ;
  3411                                  ;	
  3412                                  ;
  3413                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3414                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3415                                  ;
  3416                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3417                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3418                                  
  3419                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3420 0000139C 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3421 0000139E 0E                      		push	cs
  3422 0000139F E84000                  		call	command
  3423 000013A2 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3424                                  doc1:					
  3425 000013A4 0E                      		push	cs
  3426 000013A5 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3427 000013A8 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3428 000013AA B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3429 000013AD BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3430 000013B0 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3431 000013B1 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3432                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3433                                  
  3434                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3435                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3436                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3437                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3438                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3439                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3440                                  ;
  3441                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3442                                  
  3443                                  rsct_loop:				
  3444 000013B2 6D                      		insw
  3445 000013B3 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3446 000013B5 FB                      		sti
  3447                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3448 000013B6 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3449                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3450                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3451 000013BB 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3452 000013BD 0E                      		push	cs
  3453 000013BE E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3454 000013C1 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3455 000013C3 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3456 000013C6 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3457 000013C9 FA                      		cli
  3458 000013CA F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3459 000013CC FB                      		sti
  3460                                  doc2:					
  3461 000013CD 0E                      		push	cs
  3462 000013CE E82900                  		call	check_status
  3463 000013D1 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3464                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3465 000013D3 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3466 000013D7 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3467                                  doc3:					
  3468 000013D9 C3                      		retn
  3469                                  
  3470                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3471                                  
  3472                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3473                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3474                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3475                                  
  3476                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3477                                  
  3478                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3479                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3480                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3481                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3482                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3483                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3484                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3485                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3486                                  
  3487                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3488                                  ;
  3489                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3490                                  ;
  3491                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3492                                  ;
  3493                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3494                                  ;
  3495                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3496                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3497                                  ;	
  3498                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3499                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3500                                  
  3501                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3502                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3503                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3504                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3505 000013DA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3506 000013DD EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3507                                  
  3508                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3509                                  
  3510                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3511                                  ;
  3512                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3513                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3514                                  ;
  3515                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3516                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3517                                  ;
  3518                                  ;
  3519                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3520                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3521                                  ;
  3522                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3523                                  
  3524                                  command:	; proc near		
  3525                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3526                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3527                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3528 000013E2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3529 000013E5 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3530                                  
  3531                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3532                                  
  3533                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3534                                  ;
  3535                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3536                                  ;
  3537                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3538                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3539                                  ;
  3540                                  ;
  3541                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3542                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3543                                  ;		
  3544                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3545                                  
  3546                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3547                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3548                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3549                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3550 000013EA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3551 000013ED EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3552                                  
  3553                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3554                                  
  3555                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3556                                  ;
  3557                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3558                                  ;
  3559                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3560                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3561                                  ;
  3562                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3563                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3564                                  
  3565                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3566                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3567                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3568                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3569 000013F2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3570 000013F5 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3571                                  
  3572                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3573                                  
  3574                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3575                                  ;
  3576                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3577                                  ;
  3578                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3579                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3580                                  ;
  3581                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3582                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3583                                  
  3584                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3585                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3586                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3587                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3588 000013FA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3589 000013FD EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3590                                  
  3591                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3592                                  
  3593                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3594                                  ;
  3595                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3596                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3597                                  ;
  3598                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3599                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3600                                  ;
  3601                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3602                                  
  3603                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3604                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3605                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3606                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3607 00001402 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3608 00001405 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3609                                  
  3610                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3611                                  
  3612                                  endatrom:
  3613                                  
  3614                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3615                                  
  3616                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3617                                  ;;
  3618                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3619                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3620                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3621                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3622                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3623                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3624                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3625                                  
  3626                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3627 0000140A 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3628                                  					;
  3629                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3630                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3631                                  					;
  3632                                  					; warning!!!
  3633                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3634 0000140D 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3635                                  no_hookit:				
  3636                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3637                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3638 0000140F 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3639                                  
  3640                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3641                                  
  3642                                  mebbe_hookit:				
  3643 00001414 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3644 00001417 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3645 00001419 1E                      		push	ds
  3646 0000141A 50                      		push	ax
  3647 0000141B B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h
  3648 0000141E 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3649 00001420 58                      		pop	ax
  3650 00001421 9C                      		pushf
  3651                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3652                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3653 00001422 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3654 00001427 1F                      		pop	ds
  3655 00001428 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3656                                  
  3657                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3658                                  
  3659 0000142B 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3660                                  
  3661                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3662                                  
  3663                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3664                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3665                                  
  3666                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3667                                  
  3668                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3669                                  ;
  3670                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3671                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3672                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3673                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3674                                  
  3675                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3676 0000142C 2EFF36[F004]            		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3677 00001431 2E813E[F004]891C        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3678                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3679 00001438 730E                    		jnb	short century20
  3680 0000143A 2EC606[F404]13          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3681 00001440 2EC606[F504]50          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3682 00001446 EB13                    		jmp	short years
  3683                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3684                                  		
  3685                                  century20:				
  3686 00001448 2EC606[F404]14          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3687 0000144E 2EC606[F504]00          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3688 00001454 2E812E[F004]891C        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3689                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3690                                  years:					
  3691 0000145B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3692 0000145D 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3693 00001461 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3694                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3695 00001464 F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3696 00001466 2E8916[F004]            		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3697 0000146B B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  3698 0000146D F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3699 0000146F 2E0006[F504]            		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3700 00001474 2EFF06[F004]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3701 00001479 2E813E[F004]6E01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3702 00001480 7626                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3703 00001482 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3704 00001487 2E812E[F004]6E01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3705 0000148E B90300                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3706                                  regularyear:				
  3707 00001491 2E813E[F004]6D01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3708 00001498 7614                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3709 0000149A 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3710 0000149F 2E812E[F004]6D01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3711 000014A6 E2E9                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  3712                                  					;
  3713                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3714                                  leapyear:				
  3715 000014A8 2EC606[F704]1D          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3716                                  					; change month table.
  3717                                  yeardone:				
  3718 000014AE 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  3719 000014B0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3720 000014B2 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3721                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3722 000014B6 BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3723 000014B9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12
  3724                                  months:					
  3725 000014BC FEC3                    		inc	bl
  3726                                  
  3727                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3728                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3729                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3730                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3731                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3732                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3733                                  		
  3734 000014BE 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3735 000014C0 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3736                                  					; dh=0
  3737 000014C2 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
  3738 000014C4 46                      		inc	si		; next month
  3739 000014C5 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3740 000014C7 E2F3                    		loop	months		;
  3741                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3742                                  month_done:				
  3743 000014C9 2EC606[F704]1C          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3744                                  					; restore month table value
  3745 000014CF 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  3746 000014D1 2E8A36[F504]            		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3747 000014D6 2E8A0E[F404]            		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3748 000014DB 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3749                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3750                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3751 000014E0 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al
  3752 000014E2 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3753                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3754 000014E7 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
  3755 000014E9 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3756                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3757 000014EE 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
  3758 000014F0 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3759                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3760 000014F5 88C5                    		mov	ch, al
  3761 000014F7 2E8F06[F004]            		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3762 000014FC CB                      		retf
  3763                                  
  3764                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3765                                  
  3766                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3767                                  
  3768                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3769                                  
  3770                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3771                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3772                                  		
  3773 000014FD 51                      		push	cx		
  3774 000014FE D40A                    		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bc
  3775 00001500 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3776 00001502 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3777 00001504 08E0                    		or	al, ah
  3778 00001506 59                      		pop	cx
  3779 00001507 CB                      		retf
  3780                                  
  3781                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3782                                  
  3783                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3784                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3785                                  
  3786                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3787                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3788                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3789                                  
  3790                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3791                                  
  3792                                  int6c:					
  3793 00001508 0E                      		push	cs
  3794 00001509 1F                      		pop	ds
  3795 0000150A 8F06[BB06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3796 0000150E 8F06[BD06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3797 00001512 9D                      		popf
  3798 00001513 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3799 00001516 FA                      		cli
  3800 00001517 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3801 0000151B FB                      		sti
  3802 0000151C E8CB00                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3803 0000151F FA                      		cli
  3804 00001520 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3805 00001522 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3806                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3807                                  					; Return: time of day set
  3808 00001524 FB                      		sti
  3809                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  3810                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3811 00001525 FF2E[BB06]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  3812                                  
  3813                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3814                                  
  3815                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3816                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  3817                                  
  3818                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3819 00001529 50                      		push	ax
  3820 0000152A 51                      		push	cx
  3821 0000152B 52                      		push	dx
  3822 0000152C 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  3823 0000152E CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  3824                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  3825                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  3826                                  					; midnight
  3827                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  3828 00001530 5A                      		pop	dx
  3829 00001531 59                      		pop	cx
  3830 00001532 58                      		pop	ax
  3831 00001533 50                      		push	ax
  3832 00001534 53                      		push	bx
  3833 00001535 51                      		push	cx
  3834 00001536 52                      		push	dx
  3835 00001537 2EC706[DB06]0100        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  3836                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  3837 0000153E B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  3838 00001540 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  3839                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  3840                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  3841                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  3842                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  3843 00001542 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  3844 00001544 E99300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  3845                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3846                                  
  3847                                  read_ok:				
  3848 00001547 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  3849 0000154B 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  3850 0000154F 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  3851 00001553 8816[C206]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  3852 00001557 2EC706[DB06]0200        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  3853 0000155E E84201                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  3854 00001561 7277                    		jb	short r_d_ret	;  some	value out of range
  3855 00001563 2EC706[DB06]0300        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  3856 0000156A E8E600                  		call	date_verify
  3857 0000156D 726B                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  3858 0000156F 2EC706[DB06]0000        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  3859 00001576 E8AA00                  		call	in_bin
  3860 00001579 A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  3861 0000157C 98                      		cbw
  3862 0000157D 803E[BF06]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  3863 00001582 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  3864 00001584 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  3865                                  
  3866                                  century_19:				
  3867 00001587 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  3868 0000158A B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  3869 0000158C F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  3870 0000158E 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  3871 00001590 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  3872 00001591 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  3873                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  3874 00001594 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  3875 00001596 2EA3[DB06]              		mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  3876 0000159A 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  3877 0000159C 98                      		cbw
  3878 0000159D 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  3879 0000159F 740C                    		jz	short leap_year
  3880 000015A1 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  3881 000015A4 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  3882 000015A6 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  3883 000015AB EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  3884                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  3885                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3886                                  
  3887                                  leap_year:				
  3888 000015AD 803E[C106]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  3889 000015B2 7605                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  3890                                  leap_adjustment:			
  3891 000015B4 2EFF06[DB06]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  3892                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  3893 000015B9 8A0E[C206]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  3894 000015BD 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  3895 000015BF 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  3896 000015C0 2E010E[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  3897 000015C5 8A0E[C106]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  3898 000015C9 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  3899 000015CB 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  3900 000015CC D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  3901 000015CE BE[C306]                		mov	si, month_table
  3902 000015D1 01CE                    		add	si, cx
  3903                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3904                                  		; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  3905                                  		; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  3906                                  		; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  3907                                  		; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  3908 000015D3 8B04                    		mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  3909                                  					; get #	days in	previous months
  3910 000015D5 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  3911                                  r_d_ret:				
  3912 000015DA 2E8B36[DB06]            		mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  3913 000015DF 5A                      		pop	dx
  3914 000015E0 59                      		pop	cx
  3915 000015E1 5B                      		pop	bx
  3916 000015E2 58                      		pop	ax
  3917 000015E3 C3                      		retn
  3918                                  
  3919                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3920                                  
  3921                                  r_t_retj:				
  3922 000015E4 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  3923 000015E6 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3924 000015E8 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  3925                                  
  3926                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3927                                  
  3928                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  3929                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  3930                                  
  3931                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  3932 000015EA B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  3933 000015EC CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  3934                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  3935                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  3936                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  3937 000015EE 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  3938 000015F0 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  3939 000015F4 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  3940 000015F8 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  3941 000015FC C606[C206]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  3942 00001601 E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  3943 00001604 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  3944 00001606 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  3945 00001609 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  3946 0000160B E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  3947 0000160E 8A2E[BF06]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  3948 00001612 8A0E[C006]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  3949 00001616 8A36[C106]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  3950 0000161A 8A16[C206]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  3951                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3952                                  		; 17/09/2022
  3953                                  		; 31/05/2019
  3954 0000161E FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  3955                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  3956                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  3957                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  3958                                  r_t_ret:				
  3959 00001622 C3                      		retn
  3960                                  
  3961                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  3962                                  
  3963                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  3964                                  
  3965                                  in_bin:		; proc near		
  3966 00001623 A0[BF06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  3967 00001626 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3968 00001629 A2[BF06]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  3969 0000162C A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  3970 0000162F E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3971 00001632 A2[C006]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  3972 00001635 A0[C106]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  3973 00001638 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3974 0000163B A2[C106]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  3975 0000163E A0[C206]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  3976 00001641 E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3977 00001644 A2[C206]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  3978 00001647 C3                      		retn
  3979                                  
  3980                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  3981                                  
  3982                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  3983                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  3984                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  3985                                  
  3986                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near		
  3987 00001648 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  3988 0000164A 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  3989 0000164C B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3990 0000164E D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  3991 00001650 D50A                    		aad
  3992 00001652 C3                      		retn
  3993                                  
  3994                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3995                                  
  3996                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  3997                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  3998                                  
  3999                                  date_verify:	; proc near		
  4000 00001653 803E[BF06]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4001 00001658 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4002 0000165A 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4003 0000165C 803E[BF06]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4004                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4005                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4006 00001661 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4007 00001663 803E[C006]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4008                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4009                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4010 00001668 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4011                                  century_20:				
  4012 0000166A 803E[C006]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4013 0000166F 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4014 00001671 803E[C106]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4015 00001676 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4016 00001678 803E[C106]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4017                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4018 0000167D 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4019 0000167F 803E[C206]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4020 00001684 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4021                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4022                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4023                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4024                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4025                                  		; cf=0
  4026                                  		;clc
  4027                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4028 00001686 803E[C206]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4029 0000168B C3                      		retn
  4030                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4031                                  
  4032                                  date_error:				
  4033 0000168C F9                      		stc
  4034                                  date_err2:
  4035 0000168D C3                      		retn
  4036                                  
  4037                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4038                                  
  4039                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4040                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4041                                  
  4042                                  time_verify:	; proc near		
  4043 0000168E 803E[BF06]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4044 00001693 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4045 00001695 803E[C006]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4046 0000169A 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4047                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4048                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4049                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4050                                  		;clc
  4051                                  		;retn
  4052                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4053 0000169C 803E[C106]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4054                                  time_error:
  4055                                  bv_error:	
  4056 000016A1 F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4057 000016A2 C3                      		retn
  4058                                  
  4059                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4060                                  
  4061                                  ;time_error:				
  4062                                  		;stc
  4063                                  		;retn
  4064                                  
  4065                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4066                                  
  4067                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4068                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4069                                  
  4070                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near		
  4071 000016A3 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4072 000016A6 BB[BF06]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4073                                  bv_loop:				
  4074 000016A9 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4075 000016AB 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4076 000016AD 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4077                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4078 000016B0 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4079 000016B2 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4080 000016B4 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4081 000016B6 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4082 000016B8 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4083 000016BA D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4084 000016BC 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4085 000016BF 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4086 000016C2 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4087 000016C4 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4088 000016C5 49                      		dec	cx
  4089 000016C6 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4090 000016C8 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4091 000016C9 C3                      		retn
  4092                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4093                                  
  4094                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4095                                  ;bv_error:				
  4096                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4097                                  		;retn
  4098                                  
  4099                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4100                                  
  4101                                  endk09:

  4103                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4104                                  
  4105                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4106                                  ;									:
  4107                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4108                                  ;									:
  4109                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4110                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4111                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4112                                  ;									:
  4113                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4114                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4115                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4116                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4117                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4118                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4119                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4120                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4121                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4122                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4123                                  ;		this program.						:
  4124                                  ;									:
  4125                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4126                                  
  4127                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4128                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4129                                  
  4130                                  ; drvfat must be the first location of freeable space!
  4131                                  
  4132                                  ; 22/12/2022

  4373                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4374                                  
  4375                                  ;	entry point to call utility functions in Bios_Code. At this time,
  4376                                  ;	  we aren't doing any A20 switching. During MSINIT time Bios_Code
  4377                                  ;	  will not yet be moved to its final resting place, so we know
  4378                                  ;	  it'll be low.
  4379                                  ;
  4380                                  ;	to use this function, do a "push cs" and load bp with the offset of
  4381                                  ;	  the function you want to call in Bios_Code. This routine will
  4382                                  ;	  push the address of a retf in Bios_Code onto the stack which
  4383                                  ;	  will get executed when the utility function finishes. It will
  4384                                  ;	  then transfer control to Bios_Code:bp using a couple of pushes
  4385                                  ;	  and a retf
  4386                                  
  4387                                  ; 16/10/2022
  4388                                  ;BC_RETF equ bc_retf - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  4389                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4390                                  BC_RETF equ bc_retf
  4391                                  
  4392                                  addr_of_bcretf:	;dw 0C8h		; dw bc_retf
  4393                                  					; 2C7h:0C8h = 70h:2638h
  4394 00001763 [C800]                  		dw BC_RETF
  4395                                  
  4396                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4397                                  
  4398                                  call_bios_code:	; proc far			
  4399 00001765 2EFF36[6317]            		push	word [cs:addr_of_bcretf] 
  4400                                  					; set up near return to far return
  4401 0000176A 2EFF36[E006]            		push	word [cs:cdev+2] ; push Bios_Code segment
  4402 0000176F 55                      		push	bp		; save offset of utility function
  4403 00001770 CB                      		retf			; far jump to (DOS)BIOS code
  4404

  4406
