  8266                                  ;************************************************************************
  8267                                  ;*									*
  8268                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8269                                  ;*									*
  8270                                  ;************************************************************************
  8271                                  
  8272                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8273                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8274                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8275                                  
  8276                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8277                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8278                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8279                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8280                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8281                                  ;
  8282                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8283                                  
  8284                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8285                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8286                                  
  8287                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8288                                  
  8289                                  ;************************************************************************
  8290                                  ;*									*
  8291                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8292                                  ;*									*
  8293                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8294                                  ;*									*
  8295                                  ;************************************************************************
  8296                                  
  8297                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8298 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8299                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8300                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8301                                  prn_done:
  8302 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8303 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8304                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8305                                  
  8306                                  ;************************************************************************
  8307                                  ;*									*
  8308                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8309                                  ;*									*
  8310                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8311                                  ;*									*
  8312                                  ;************************************************************************
  8313                                  
  8314                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8315                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8316 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8317                                  prn_loop:				
  8318 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8319                                  prn_out:				
  8320 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8321 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8322 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8323 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8324 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8325 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8326 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8327 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8328 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8329 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8330 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8331                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8332                                  
  8333                                  _prnwf:					
  8334 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8335 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8336                                  TestPrnError:				
  8337 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8338 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8339                                  pmessg:					
  8340 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8341                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  8345 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8346                                  ;prn_done:				
  8347                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8348                                  prn_done2:
  8349                                  		;clc
  8350                                  		; cf=0
  8351 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8352                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8353                                  
  8354                                  ;************************************************************************
  8355                                  ;*									*
  8356                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8357                                  ;*									*
  8358                                  ;************************************************************************
  8359                                  
  8360                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8361 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8362 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8363 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8364                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8365                                  		; 12/12/2022

  8367 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8368                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8369                                  
  8370                                  ;************************************************************************
  8371                                  ;*									*
  8372                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8373                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8374                                  ;*									*
  8375                                  ;************************************************************************
  8376                                  
  8377                                  prnstat:				
  8378 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8379                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8380                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8381                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8382                                  
  8383                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8384                                  
  8385                                  ;************************************************************************
  8386                                  ;*									*
  8387                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8388                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8389                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8390                                  ;*									*
  8391                                  ;************************************************************************
  8392                                  
  8393                                  prnop:	
  8394 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8395 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8396                                  
  8397                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8398                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8399                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8400                                  
  8401 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8402 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8403 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8404 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8405 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8406 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8407 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8408                                  
  8409                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8410                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8411                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8412                                  
  8413                                  NextTest:				
  8414 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8415                                  					; i/o error?
  8416 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8417                                  
  8418                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8419                                  
  8420 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8421                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8422 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8423 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8424 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8425                                  ret1:					
  8426 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8427                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8428                                  
  8429                                  checknotready:				
  8430 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8431 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8432 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8433                                  
  8434                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8435                                  
  8436                                  ;************************************************************************
  8437                                  ;*									*
  8438                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8439                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8440                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8441                                  ;*									*
  8442                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8443                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8444                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8445                                  ;*									*
  8446                                  ;************************************************************************
  8447                                  
  8448                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8449                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8450 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8451                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8452 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8453 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8454 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8455 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8456 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8457                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8458 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8459 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8460                                  prn_getstat:				
  8461 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8462 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8463 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8464 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8465 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8466 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8467 000002A6 26                      		es
  8468 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8469                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8470                                  					; lodsb
  8471 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8472 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8473 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8474 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8475                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8476                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8477                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8478 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8479                                  
  8480                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8481                                  
  8482                                  prn_bperr:				
  8483 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8484                                  prn_berr:				
  8485 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  8501                                  ;********************************;*
  8502

  8528 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]

  8544                                  					; return current retry count
  8545                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8546                                  		; cf=0
  8547                                  		;clc
  8548 000002EA C3                      		retn

  8581                                  ;************************************************************************
  8582                                  ;*									*
  8583                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8584                                  ;*									*
  8585                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8586                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8587                                  ;*									*

  8589                                  
  8590                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8591                                  
  8592                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8593                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8594                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8595

  8597                                  
  8598                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8599                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8600                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8601                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8602                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8603                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8604                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8605                                  
  8606                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8607                                  
  8608                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8609                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8610                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8611                                  
  8612                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8613                                  
  8614                                  ;************************************************************************
  8615                                  ;*									*
  8616                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8617                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8618                                  ;*									*
  8619                                  ;************************************************************************
  8620                                  
  8621                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8622                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8623 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8624 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8625 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8626 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8627 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8628 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8629                                  aux1:					
  8630 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8631                                  					; won't return if error
  8632                                  aux2:

  8635                                  exvec2:

  8637                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022

  8640                                  
  8641                                  ;************************************************************************
  8642                                  ;*									*
  8643                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8644                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8645                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8646                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8647                                  ;*									*
  8648                                  ;************************************************************************
  8649                                  
  8650                                  auxin:

  8652 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8653 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8654                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8655                                  		;retn
  8656                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8657 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8658                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8659                                  
  8660                                  arbad:					
  8661 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8662 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8663 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8664 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8665                                  
  8666                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8667                                  
  8668                                  ;************************************************************************
  8669                                  ;*									*
  8670                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8671                                  ;*									*
  8672                                  ;************************************************************************
  8673                                  
  8674                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h

  8677 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8678 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8679 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8680 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8681 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8682 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8683 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8684 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8685 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8686                                  auxdrx:					
  8687 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8688                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8689

  8704 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8705 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8706                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8707                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8708                                  		;clc
  8709 00000359 C3                      		retn
  8710                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8711                                  
  8712                                  ;************************************************************************
  8713                                  ;*									*
  8714                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8715                                  ;*									*
  8716                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8717                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8718                                  ;*									*
  8719                                  ;************************************************************************
  8720                                  
  8721                                  auxstat:				
  8722 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8723                                  
  8724                                  		; fall into auxop
  8725                                  
  8726                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8727                                  
  8728                                  ;************************************************************************
  8729                                  ;*									*
  8730                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8731                                  ;*									*
  8732                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8733                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8734                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8735                                  ;*									*
  8736                                  ;************************************************************************
  8737                                  
  8738                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8739 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8740                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8741                                  					; get port number
  8742 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8743                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8744                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8745 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8746                                  
  8747                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8748                                  
  8749                                  ;************************************************************************
  8750                                  ;*									*
  8751                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8752                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8753                                  ;*									*
  8754                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8755                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8756                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8757                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8758                                  ;*									*
  8759                                  ;************************************************************************
  8760                                  
  8761                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8762 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8763 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8764                                  					; zero out buffer
  8765                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8766                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8767                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8768 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8769                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8770                                  
  8771                                  ;************************************************************************
  8772                                  ;*									*
  8773                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8774                                  ;*									*
  8775                                  ;************************************************************************
  8776                                  
  8777                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8778                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8779 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8780                                  aux_loop:				
  8781 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8782                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8783 0000036F 47                      		inc	di
  8784 00000370 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  8785 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8786 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8787 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  8788 0000037A B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  8789 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8790                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8791                                  
  8792                                  awok:					
  8793 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8794                                  					; still	more character to print
  8795                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8796                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8797                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8798 00000381 C3                      		retn
  8799                                  
  8800                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8801                                  
  8802                                  ;************************************************************************
  8803                                  ;*									*
  8804                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  8805                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  8806                                  ;*									*
  8807                                  ;************************************************************************
  8808                                  
  8809                                  getbx:	
  8810 00000382 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  8811                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  8812                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  8813 00000386 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  8814                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8815                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  8816 0000038A C3                      		retn
  8817                                  
  8818                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8819                                  
  8820                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8821                                  
  8822                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8823                                  ;								:
  8824                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  8825                                  ;								:
  8826                                  ;								:
  8827                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  8828                                  ;								:
  8829                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  8830                                  ;								:
  8831                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  8832                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  8833                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  8834                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  8835                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  8836                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  8837                                  ;								:
  8838                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  8839                                  ;								:
  8840                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  8841                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  8842                                  ;								:
  8843                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8844                                  
  8845                                  ; convert time to ticks
  8846                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  8847                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  8848                                  
  8849                                  ;19/07/2019
  8850                                  ;09/03/2019
  8851                                  
  8852                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  8853                                  
  8854                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  8855                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  8856                                  
  8857 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  8858 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  8859 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8860 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  8861 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  8862 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  8863 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  8864 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  8865 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  8866 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  8867 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  8868 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  8869 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  8870 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  8871 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8872                                  
  8873                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  8874                                  
  8875 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  8876 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  8877 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  8878 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  8879 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  8880 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  8881 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  8882 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  8883 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8884 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  8885 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  8886 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  8887 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  8888 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8889 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  8890 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  8891 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  8892 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  8893 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  8894 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  8895                                  
  8896                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8897                                  
  8898                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8899                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8900                                  
  8901                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8902                                  ;
  8903                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  8904                                  ;
  8905                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  8906                                  ;
  8907                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  8908                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  8909                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  8910                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  8911                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  8912                                  ;
  8913                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  8914                                  ;
  8915                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8916                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8917                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8918                                  ;
  8919                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8920                                  
  8921                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  8922 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  8923 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  8924                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  8925 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8926                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8927 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  8928 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  8929                                  					; get binary hours
  8930                                  					; convert to bcd
  8931 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8932                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  8933 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  8934 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  8935 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8936                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  8937 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  8938 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  8939 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8940                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  8941 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  8942 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  8943 000003FB FA                      		cli
  8944 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  8945 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8946                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  8947                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  8948                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8949 00000400 FB                      		sti
  8950                                  no_cmos_1:				
  8951 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  8952 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  8953                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8954 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  8955                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  8956                                  					; convert time to ticks
  8957                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  8958 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  8959 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8960 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  8961                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  8962                                  					; Return: time of day set
  8963                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  8964 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  8965 00000416 FB                      		sti
  8966                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8967 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8968 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  8969 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  8970                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  8971                                  					; convert to bcd format
  8972 00000422 FA                      		cli
  8973 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  8974 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8975                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  8976                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  8977                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8978 00000427 FB                      		sti
  8979                                  no_cmos_2:
  8980                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8981                                  		; cf=0				
  8982                                  		;clc
  8983 00000428 C3                      		retn
  8984                                  
  8985                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8986                                  
  8987                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8988                                  
  8989                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8990                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  8991                                  ; and returns the following information:
  8992                                  ;
  8993                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  8994                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  8995                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  8996                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  8997                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  8998                                  ;
  8999                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9000                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9001                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9002                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9003                                  
  9004                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  9005 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  9006 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  9007                                  
  9008                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  9009                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  9010                                  ;
  9011                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  9012                                  ;	       ----------------
  9013                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  9014                                  ;
  9015                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9016                                  ;
  9017                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9018                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9019                                  ;		1,193,180
  9020                                  ;
  9021                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9022                                  ;
  9023                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9024                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9025                                  ;		59,659
  9026                                  ;
  9027                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9028                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9029                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9030                                  ;
  9031                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9032                                  ; multiply by 5
  9033                                  
  9034 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9035 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9036                                  					; multiply by 5
  9037 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9038 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9039 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9040 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9041 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9042 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9043 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9044                                  
  9045                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9046                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9047                                  
  9048 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9049 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9050                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9051 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9052 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9053 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9054                                  
  9055                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9056                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9057                                  
  9058 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9059 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9060                                  
  9061                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9062                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9063                                  
  9064 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9065 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9066 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9067 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9068                                  noadj:					
  9069 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9070 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9071                                  
  9072                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9073                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9074                                  
  9075 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9076 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9077 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9078 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9079 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9080 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9081 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9082 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9083                                  
  9084                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9085                                  
  9086 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9087 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9088 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9089 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9090 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9091 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9092 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9093 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9094 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9095                                  
  9096                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9097                                  
  9098                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9099                                  
  9100                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9101                                  ;
  9102                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9103                                  ;
  9104                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9105                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9106                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9107                                  ;
  9108                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9109                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9110                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9111                                  ;			else
  9112                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9113                                  ;		}
  9114                                  ;
  9115                                  ; USES : AX
  9116                                  ;
  9117                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9118                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9119                                  ;
  9120                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9121                                  
  9122                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9123                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9124 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9125 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9126                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9127                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9128                                  					; midnight
  9129                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9130 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9131 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9132 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9133                                  					; and not flag
  9134 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9135 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9136                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9137                                  
  9138                                  inc_case:				
  9139 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9140 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9141 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9142                                  no_rollover:				
  9143 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9144

  9172                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9173                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9174                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9175                                  
  9176                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9177                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9178                                  
  9179                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9180                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9181                                  
  9182                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9183                                  
  9184                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9185                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9186                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9187                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9188                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9189                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9190                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9191                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9192                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9193                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9194                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9195                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9196                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9197                                  
  9198                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9199                                  
  9200                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9201                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9202                                  ;
  9203                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9204                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9205                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9206                                  ;   else
  9207                                  ;	set slow = value
  9208                                  ;   ...
  9209                                  ;*********************************************
  9210                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9211                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9212                                  ;*	 use slow
  9213                                  ;*   else
  9214                                  ;*	 use fast
  9215                                  ;*********************************************
  9216                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9217                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9218                                  ;	use slow
  9219                                  ;   else
  9220                                  ;	use fast
  9221                                  ;   ...
  9222                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9223                                  ;
  9224                                  ;
  9225                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9226                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9227                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9228                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9229                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9230                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9231                                  
  9232                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9233                                  
  9234                                  ; 15/10/2022

  9312                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9313                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9314                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9315                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9316                                  ;
  9317                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9318                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9319                                  
  9320                                  SetDrive:	
  9321                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9322 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9323                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9324 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9325 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9326 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9327 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9328 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9329 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9330                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9331 000004DE C3                      		retn

  9335                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9336                                  
  9337                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9338                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9339                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9340                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9341                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9342                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9343                                  
  9344                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh
  9345 000004DF E8E9FF                  		call	SetDrive
  9346 000004E2 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
  9347 000004E5 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9348                                  					; fchanged_by_format
  9349 000004EA 7416                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
  9350                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9351 000004EC 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format
  9352                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FEFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9353                                  					; ~fchanged_by_format ;	reset flag
  9354 000004F1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh ; -1
  9355                                  					; Ensure that we ask the rom if media has changed
  9356 000004F6 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9357                                  					; fnon_removable
  9358 000004FB 740C                    		jz	short wehaveafloppy
  9359 000004FD BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; Indicate media changed
  9360 00000500 EB2C                    		jmp	short Media_Done ; Media_Done
  9361                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9362                                  
  9363                                  WeAreNotFakingIt:
  9364                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable			
  9365 00000502 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
  9366 00000507 7525                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9367                                  wehaveafloppy:

  9422                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9423                                  
  9424                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9425                                  ; perform a check on the time passed since the last access for this physical
  9426                                  ; drive.
  9427                                  ; we are accessing the same drive. if the time of last successful access was
  9428                                  ; less than 2 seconds ago, then we may presume that the disk was not changed.
  9429                                  ; returns in si:
  9430                                  ;	0 - if time of last access was >= 2 seconds
  9431                                  ;	1 - if time was < 2 seconds (i.e no media change assumed)
  9432                                  ; registers affected ax,cx,dx, flags.
  9433                                  ;
  9434                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds->Bios_Data
  9435                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9436                                  
  9437                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9438                                  Check_Time_Of_Access:
  9439 00000553 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; presume no change.
  9440 00000556 E821FF                  		call	GetTickCnt	; cx:dx	is the elapsed time
  9441 00000559 268B4547                		mov	ax, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
  9442                                  					; get stored time
  9443 0000055D 29C2                    		sub	dx, ax
  9444 0000055F 268B4549                		mov	ax, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
  9445 00000563 19C1                    		sbb	cx, ax
  9446 00000565 751A                    		jnz	short timecheck_unk ; cx<>0 => >1 hour
  9447 00000567 09D2                    		or	dx, dx		; time must pass
  9448 00000569 7511                    		jnz	short timepassed ; yes, examine max value
  9449 0000056B FE06[1D01]              		inc	byte [accesscount]
  9450 0000056F 803E[1D01]05            		cmp	byte [accesscount], 5 
  9451                                  					; if count is less than threshold, ok
  9452 00000574 720C                    		jb	short timecheck_ret
  9453 00000576 FE0E[1D01]              		dec	byte [accesscount] ; don't let the count wrap
  9454 0000057A EB05                    		jmp	short timecheck_unk ; "i don't know" if media changed
  9455                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9456                                  
  9457                                  timepassed:				
  9458 0000057C 83FA24                  		cmp	dx, 36		; 18*2 ; 18.2 tics per second.
  9459                                  					; min elapsed time? (2 seconds)
  9460 0000057F 7601                    		jbe	short timecheck_ret ; yes, presume no change
  9461                                  
  9462                                  		; everything indicates that we do not know what has happened.
  9463                                  timecheck_unk:				
  9464 00000581 4E                      		dec	si		; presume i don't know
  9465                                  timecheck_ret:				
  9466 00000582 C3                      		retn
  9467                                  
  9468                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  9597                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9598                                  ;	getbp - return bpb from the drive specified by the bds.
  9599                                  ;	    if the return_fake_bpb flag is set, then it does nothing.
  9600                                  ;	    note that we never come here for fixed disks.
  9601                                  ;	    for all other cases,
  9602                                  ;	      - it reads boot sector to pull out the bpb
  9603                                  ;	      - if no valid bpb is found, it then reads the fat sector,
  9604                                  ;		to get the fat id byte to build the bpb from there.
  9605                                  ;
  9606                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds.
  9607                                  ;
  9608                                  ;   outputs:	fills in bpb in current bds if valid bpb or fat id on disk.
  9609                                  ;		carry set, and al=7 if invalid disk.
  9610                                  ;		carry set and error code in al if other error.
  9611                                  ;		if failed to recognize the boot record, then will set the
  9612                                  ;		set_id_flag to 0.
  9613                                  ;		this routine will only work for a floppy diskette.
  9614                                  ;		     for a fixed disk, it will just return.
  9615                                  ;
  9616                                  ;	****** Note: getbp is a clone of getbp which uses the newer
  9617                                  ;	  segment definitions. It should be migrated towards.
  9618                                  ;	   now es:di has the bds, ds: has Bios_Data
  9619                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9620                                  
  9621                                  GetBp:		; if returning fake bpb then return bpb as is.
  9622                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], return_fake_bpb|fnon_removable		
  9623 000005F7 26F6452305              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 5
  9624 000005FC 7403                    		jz	short getbp1	; getbp1
  9625 000005FE E99500                  		jmp	getret_exit
  9626                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9627

  9631 00000603 53                      		push	bx
  9632                                  
  9633                                  		; attempt to read in boot sector and determine bpb.
  9634                                  		; we assume that the 2.x and greater dos disks all
  9635                                  		; have a valid boot sector.
  9636                                  
  9637 00000604 E8A400                  		call	readbootsec
  9638 00000607 7209                    		jb	short getbp_err_ret_brdg ; carry set if there was error.
  9639 00000609 09DB                    		or	bx, bx		; bx is	0 if boot sector is valid.
  9640 0000060B 7508                    		jnz	short dofatbpb

  9642 00000610 EB57                    		jmp	short Has1

  9644
