  9753                                  
  9754                                  got_unknown_medium:			
  9755                                  		;mov	ds:set_id_flag,	0 
  9756 000006A1 C606[0A05]00            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 0
  9757 000006A6 B007                    		mov	al, 7
  9758 000006A8 F9                      		stc
  9759 000006A9 EBE8                    		jmp	short getret
  9760                                  
  9761                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9762                                  
  9763                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  9764                                  
  9765                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
  9766                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
  9767                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
  9768                                  ;
  9769                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
  9770                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
  9771                                  
  9772                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9773                                  
  9774                                  readbootsec:	
  9775 000006AB B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
  9776 000006AD B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
  9777 000006B0 E8C600                  		call	read_sector
  9778 000006B3 724A                    		jb	short err_ret
  9779 000006B5 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
  9780                                  
  9781                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
  9782                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
  9783                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
  9784                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
  9785                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
  9786                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
  9787                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
  9788                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
  9789                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
  9790                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
  9791                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
  9792                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
  9793                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
  9794                                  		; informations
  9795                                  
  9796                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
  9797                                  
  9798                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9799 000006B7 803E[4E01]69            		cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
  9800 000006BC 7415                    		jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
  9801 000006BE 803E[4E01]E9            		cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
  9802 000006C3 740E                    		jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
  9803 000006C5 803E[4E01]EB            		cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
  9804 000006CA 7531                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
  9805 000006CC 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
  9806 000006D1 752A                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
  9807                                  
  9808                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  9809                                  ;
  9810                                  ;; 10/03/2019
  9811                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
  9812                                  ;;
  9813                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
  9814                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
  9815                                  ;;
  9816                                  ;;check_signature:
  9817                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
  9818                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
  9819                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if singled sided medium.
  9820                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
  9821                                  
  9822                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
  9823                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
  9824                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
  9825                                  
  9826                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9827                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:			
  9828 000006D3 A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
  9829                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
  9830 000006D6 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
  9831 000006D8 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
  9832 000006DA 7521                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
  9833                                  
  9834                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
  9835                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
  9836                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
  9837                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
  9838                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
  9839                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
  9840                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
  9841                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
  9842                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
  9843                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
  9844                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
  9845                                  
  9846                                  checksinglesided:
  9847 000006DC A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
  9848 000006DF 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
  9849 000006E1 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
  9850 000006E3 A801                    		test	al, 1
  9851 000006E5 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
  9852 000006E7 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
  9853 000006ED 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
  9854 000006EF 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
  9855 000006F4 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
  9856                                  
  9857                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
  9858                                  
  9859                                  mustbeearlier:				
  9860 000006F6 C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
  9861                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
  9862 000006FB EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk
  9863                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9864                                  
  9865                                  invalidbootsec:				
  9866 000006FD 43                      		inc	bx		; indicate that boot sector invalid
  9867                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9868                                  movbpb_ret:
  9869                                  gooddsk:				
  9870 000006FE F8                      		clc
  9871                                  err_ret:
  9872 000006FF C3                      		retn
  9873                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9874                                  
  9875                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9876                                  ;err_ret:				
  9877                                  		;retn
  9878                                  
  9879                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9880                                  
  9881                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9882                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9883                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
  9884                                  ; getbp routine at has1
  9885                                  ;
  9886                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
  9887                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
  9888                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
  9889                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
  9890                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
  9891                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
  9892                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9893                                  
  9894                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9895                                  
  9896                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9897                                  movbpb:	
  9898 00000700 8A36[5B01]              		mov	dh, [disksector+0Dh]
  9899                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
  9900                                  					; sectors per unit
  9901 00000704 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
  9902                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
  9903                                  					; number of directory entries
  9904 00000708 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
  9905                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
  9906                                  					; size of drive
  9907 0000070C 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
  9908                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
  9909                                  					; media	descriptor
  9910 00000710 A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
  9911                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
  9912                                  					; number of fat	sectors
  9913 00000713 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
  9914                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
  9915                                  					; sectors per track
  9916 00000717 8A16[6801]              		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
  9917                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
  9918                                  					; number of heads
  9919 0000071B 803E[0A05]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?
  9920 00000720 75DC                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
  9921 00000722 E81200                  		call	mov_media_ids
  9922 00000725 7205                    		jb	short movbpb_conv ; conventional boot record?
  9923 00000727 C606[0A05]02            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 2 ; signals that volume id is set
  9924                                  movbpb_conv:				
  9925 0000072C 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1
  9926 00000731 75CB                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
  9927 00000733 E8D411                  		call	resetchanged	; reset	flags in bds to	not fchanged.
  9928                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9929                                  		; cf = 0
  9930                                  ;movbpb_ret:				
  9931                                  		;clc
  9932 00000736 C3                      		retn
  9933                                  
  9934                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9935                                  
  9936                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
  9937                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
  9938                                  ;by es:di.
  9939                                  
  9940                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
  9941                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
  9942                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
  9943                                  ;      the boot record information.
  9944                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
  9945                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
  9946                                  
  9947                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9948                                  mov_media_ids:		
  9949 00000737 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
  9950                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
  9951                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
  9952 0000073C 752C                    		jnz	short mmi_not_ext
  9953 0000073E 51                      		push	cx
  9954 0000073F 8B0E[7501]              		mov	cx, [disksector+27h]
  9955                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
  9956 00000743 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
  9957 00000747 8B0E[7701]              		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
  9958                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
  9959 0000074B 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
  9960 0000074F 57                      		push	di
  9961 00000750 56                      		push	si
  9962 00000751 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
  9963 00000754 BE[7901]                		mov	si, disksector+2Bh
  9964                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;
  9965                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.VOL_LABEL
  9966 00000757 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
  9967 0000075A F3A4                    		rep movsb
  9968                                  		;mov	cx, 8		; size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
  9969                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9970 0000075C B108                    		mov	cl, 8 ; cx = 8
  9971 0000075E BE[8401]                		mov	si, disksector+36h
  9972                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+36h) ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SYSTEM_ID
  9973 00000761 83C705                  		add	di, 5		; (BDS.filesys_id-BDS.volid)-size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
  9974 00000764 F3A4                    		rep movsb
  9975 00000766 5E                      		pop	si
  9976 00000767 5F                      		pop	di
  9977 00000768 59                      		pop	cx
  9978                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9979                                  		; cf = 0
  9980                                  		;clc		; this clc is not required (16/06/2019 - Erdogan Tan)
  9981                                  				; (20/09/2022)
  9982 00000769 C3                      		retn
  9983                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9984                                  
  9985                                  mmi_not_ext:				
  9986 0000076A F9                      		stc
  9987 0000076B C3                      		retn
  9988                                  
  9989                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9990                                  
  9991                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9992                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  9993                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
  9994                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
  9995                                  ; output:
  9996                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
  9997                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
  9998                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  9999                                  
 10000                                  readfat:	
 10001                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 10002                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10003 0000076C 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10004 0000076E B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 10005                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
 10006 00000771 E80500                  		call	read_sector
 10007 00000774 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 10008 00000776 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 10009                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 10010 00000778 C3                      		retn
 10011                                  
 10012                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10013                                  
 10014                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10015                                  
 10016                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10017                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 10018                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 10019                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 10020                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 10021                                  ;		dh has head
 10022                                  ;		es:di has bds
 10023                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 10024                                  ;
 10025                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 10026                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 10027                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 10028                                  ;
 10029                                  ;		carry set
 10030                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 10031                                  ;
 10032                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 10033                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10034                                  
 10035                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10036                                  
 10037                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10038                                  read_sector:	
 10039 00000779 55                      		push	bp
 10040 0000077A BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 10041 0000077D 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10042 00000781 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 10043                                  rd_ret:					
 10044 00000784 06                      		push	es
 10045 00000785 1E                      		push	ds
 10046 00000786 07                      		pop	es
 10047 00000787 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10048 0000078A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10049                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10050                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10051                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10052 0000078C 07                      		pop	es
 10053 0000078D 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 10054                                  rd_rty:					
 10055 0000078F E87604                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 10056 00000792 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 10057 00000794 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10058                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10059                                  					; fnon_removable
 10060 00000799 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 10061 0000079B 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10062 000007A0 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 10063 000007A2 50                      		push	ax
 10064 000007A3 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 10065 000007A4 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10066                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10067                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10068                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 10069                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10070 000007A8 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 10071 000007AA 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 10072                                  		; 
 10073 000007AD 1F                      		pop	ds
 10074 000007AE A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 10075 000007B1 58                      		pop	ax
 10076                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 10077 000007B2 06                      		push	es
 10078 000007B3 1E                      		push	ds
 10079 000007B4 07                      		pop	es
 10080 000007B5 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10081 000007B8 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10082                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10083                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10084                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10085 000007BA 07                      		pop	es
 10086 000007BB 9C                      		pushf
 10087 000007BC 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10088 000007C1 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 10089 000007C3 50                      		push	ax
 10090 000007C4 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 10091 000007C7 1E                      		push	ds
 10092 000007C8 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10093 000007CC 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10094 000007CF 1F                      		pop	ds
 10095 000007D0 58                      		pop	ax
 10096                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 10097 000007D1 9D                      		popf
 10098 000007D2 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 10099 000007D4 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty
 10100                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10101                                  
 10102                                  err_rd_ret:				
 10103 000007D6 B2FF                    		mov	dl, 0FFh	; make sure we ask rom if media	has changed
 10104                                  					; return error
 10105 000007D8 F9                      		stc
 10106                                  
 10107                                  ; update information pertaining to last drive accessed, time of access, last
 10108                                  ; track accessed in that drive.
 10109                                  
 10110                                  okret2:					
 10111 000007D9 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl	; set up for head settle logic in disk
 10112 000007DD 8816[1E01]              		mov	[tim_drv], dl	; save drive last accessed
 10113 000007E1 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10114                                  					; save last track accessed on this drive
 10115                                  					; preserve flags in case error occurred
 10116 000007E5 9C                      		pushf
 10117 000007E6 E8FF03                  		call	set_tim
 10118 000007E9 9D                      		popf			; restore flags
 10119 000007EA 5D                      		pop	bp
 10120 000007EB C3                      		retn

 10213                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10214                                  
 10215                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10216                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 10217                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 10218                                  
 10219                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10220                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10221                                  ;
 10222                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 10223                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10224                                  
 10225                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10226                                  checksingle:		
 10227 0000083B 50                      		push	ax
 10228 0000083C 53                      		push	bx
 10229 0000083D 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10230                                  
 10231                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 10232                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 10233                                  
 10234 00000841 F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 10235 00000844 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 10236 00000846 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 10237                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 10238 00000849 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 10239                                  
 10240                                  
 10241                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 10242                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 10243                                  
 10244 0000084B 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10245                                  					; get physical drive number
 10246 0000084F 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 10247 00000850 57                      		push	di
 10248 00000851 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 10249                                  scan_list:				
 10250 00000855 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 10251 00000859 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 10252 0000085B B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 10253 0000085D 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 10254 00000861 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 10255 00000863 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 10256 00000867 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 10257 00000868 07                      		pop	es
 10258 00000869 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 10259                                  
 10260                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 10261                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 10262                                  ; in this case.
 10263 0000086D 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
 10264 00000872 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 10265                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 10266 00000874 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 10267 00000879 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 10268 0000087B 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 10269                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 10270                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 10271 0000087F 06                      		push	es
 10272 00000880 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10273 00000884 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
 10274                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10275                                  					; set up sdsb
 10276 00000888 07                      		pop	es		; restore bds pointer
 10277 00000889 EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
 10278                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10279                                  
 10280                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 10281                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 10282                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 10283                                  
 10284                                  not_fsetowner:				
 10285 0000088B 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2 ; if (single_drive_system)
 10286 00000890 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
 10287 00000892 50                      		push	ax
 10288 00000893 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
 10289 00000897 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 10290 00000899 06                      		push	es
 10291 0000089A 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10292 0000089E 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]
 10293                                  		;xchg	al, es:504h	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10294                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10295 000008A3 07                      		pop	es
 10296 000008A4 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; else
 10297 000008A6 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10298 000008A7 7410                    		jz	short singleret	; issue	swap_dsk_msg
 10299                                  ignore_sdsb:				
 10300 000008A9 E8800E                  		call	swpdsk
 10301 000008AC EB0B                    		jmp	short singleret
 10302                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10303                                  
 10304                                  scan_skip:	
 10305 000008AE 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]			
 10306                                  		;les	di, es:[di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 10307                                  					; go to	next bds
 10308 000008B1 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; end of list?
 10309 000008B4 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
 10310 000008B6 F9                      		stc
 10311 000008B7 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 10312 000008B8 07                      		pop	es
 10313                                  
 10314                                  singleret:

 10337                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10338                                  
 10339                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10340                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10341                                  ;
 10342                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10343                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10344                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10345                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10346                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10347                                  ;	ds = cs
 10348                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10349                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10350                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10351                                  ;
 10352                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10353                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10354                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10355                                  
 10356                                  diskrd:	
 10357                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10358                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10359 000008C4 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10360                                  
 10361                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10362                                  
 10363                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10364                                  diskio:
 10365 000008C9 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10366 000008CB 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10367 000008CF E8F9FB                  		call	SetDrive
 10368 000008D2 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10369 000008D6 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10370                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10371 000008D9 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10372                                  
 10373                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10374                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10375                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10376                                  
 10377 000008DB 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10378                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10379                                  					; unformatted_media
 10380 000008E0 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10381 000008E2 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10382 000008E6 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10383                                  
 10384                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 10385                                  
 10386 000008EA 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10387 000008EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 10388 000008EE 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 10389 000008F0 83D600                  		adc	si, 0
 10390 000008F3 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10391                                  					; > 32 bit sector ?
 10392 000008F8 740D                    		jz	short sanity32
 10393 000008FA 83FE00                  		cmp	si, 0
 10394 000008FD 75BD                    		jnz	short baddrive
 10395 000008FF 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10396 00000903 77B7                    		ja	short baddrive
 10397 00000905 EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 10398                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10399                                  
 10400                                  sanity32:				
 10401 00000907 0336[2B05]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 10402 0000090B 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 10403 0000090F 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 10404 00000911 77A9                    		ja	short baddrive
 10405 00000913 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 10406 00000917 77A3                    		ja	short baddrive
 10407                                  
 10408                                  sanityok:				
 10409 00000919 8B16[2B05]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 10410 0000091D 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 10411 00000921 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 10412                                  
 10413                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 10414                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 10415                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 10416                                  
 10417 00000925 A3[2D05]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 10418                                  
 10419                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 10420                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 10421                                  
 10422 00000928 06                      		push	es
 10423 00000929 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10424 0000092D 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 10425                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 10426                                  					; current disk parm table
 10427 00000932 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si

 10429 0000093A 07                      		pop	es

 10431                                  					; fnon_removable
 10432 00000940 7510                    		jnz	short skip_setup
 10433 00000942 E8F6FE                  		call	checksingle
 10434                                  
 10435                                  ; check to see if we have previously noted a change line. the routine
 10436                                  ; returns if everything is ok. otherwise, it pops off the stack and returns
 10437                                  ; the proper error code.
 10438                                  
 10439 00000945 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 10440 0000094A 7403                    		jz	short diskio_nochangeline ; brif not
 10441 0000094C E8AB0E                  		call	checklatchio	; will do a sneaky pop stack return
 10442                                  					; if a disk error occurs
 10443                                  diskio_nochangeline:			
 10444 0000094F E84700                  		call	iosetup		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 10445                                  
 10446                                  ; now the settle values are correct for the following code
 10447                                  
 10448                                  skip_setup:
 10449                                  
 10450                                  ; 32 bit sector calculation.
 10451                                  ; dx:[saved_word] = starting sector number.
 10452                                  				
 10453 00000952 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10454 00000954 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10455 00000956 26F77513                		div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10456                                  					 ; divide by sec per track
 10457 0000095A A3[2905]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
 10458 0000095D A1[2D05]                		mov	ax, [saved_word]
 10459 00000960 26F77513                		div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10460                                  					; now, [temp_h]:ax = track #, dx = sector
 10461                                  		;inc	dl		; sector number	is 1 based.
 10462                                  		; 18/12/2022
 10463 00000964 42                      		inc	dx
 10464 00000965 8816[3101]              		mov	[cursec], dl	; save current sector
 10465 00000969 268B4D15                		mov	cx, [es:di+15h]	; es:di+BDS.heads]
 10466                                  					; get number of	heads
 10467 0000096D 50                      		push	ax
 10468 0000096E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10469 00000970 A1[2905]                		mov	ax, [temp_h]	; divide tracks	by heads per cylinder
 10470 00000973 F7F1                    		div	cx
 10471 00000975 A3[2905]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
 10472 00000978 58                      		pop	ax
 10473 00000979 F7F1                    		div	cx		; now, [temp_h]:ax = cylinder #, dx = head
 10474 0000097B 833E[2905]00            		cmp	word [temp_h], 0
 10475 00000980 7714                    		ja	short baddrive_brdg
 10476 00000982 3D0004                  		cmp	ax, 1024	; 2^10 currently maxium	for track #.
 10477 00000985 770F                    		ja	short baddrive_brdg
 10478 00000987 8816[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dl	; save current head
 10479 0000098B A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax	; save current track
 10480                                  
 10481                                  ; we are now set up for the i/o. normally, we consider the dma boundary
 10482                                  ; violations here. not true. we perform the operation as if everything is
 10483                                  ; symmetric; let the int 13 handler worry about the dma violations.
 10484

 10486 00000991 E88400                  		call	block		; (cas - call/ret)

 10488                                  		;retn
 10489                                  		; 18/12/2022

 10498

 10500                                  ; set the drive-last-accessed flag for diskette only. 
 10501                                  ; we know that the hard disk will not be removed.
 10502                                  ; es:di -> current bds.
 10503                                  ; ds -> Bios_Data
 10504                                  ; ax,cx,si are destroyed.
 10505                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10506                                  
 10507                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10508                                  iosetup:	
 10509 00000999 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]

 10511                                  
 10512                                  ; determine proper head settle values
 10513                                  
 10514 000009A0 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10515 000009A5 7539                    		jnz	short skip_dpt_setting

 10517 000009AA 1E                      		push	ds
 10518 000009AB C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]	; get pointer to disk base table
 10519 000009AF 884404                  		mov	[si+4],	al
 10520 000009B2 8A440A                  		mov	al, [si+10]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]

 10524 000009BC 8826[2B01]              		mov	[save_eot], ah
 10525                                  
 10526                                  ; for 3.5" drives, both external as well as on the k09, we need to set the
 10527                                  ; motor start time to 4. this checking for every i/o is going to affect
 10528                                  ; performance across the board, but is necessary!!
 10529                                  
 10530 000009C0 1E                      		push	ds
 10531 000009C1 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]	; get pointer to disk base table
 10532 000009C5 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 10533                                  					; ffSmall

 10535 000009CC B004                    		mov	al, 4
 10536 000009CE 86440A                  		xchg	al, [si+10]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 10537                                  motor_start_ok:
 10538                                  
 10539                                  ; ds:si now points to disk parameter table.
 10540                                  ; get current settle and set fast settle
 10541

 10548                                  					; get settle and set up	for fast

 10552                                  					; someone has diddled the settle
 10553 000009DD A2[2801]                		mov	[settleslow], al
 10554                                  skip_dpt_setting:

 10556                                  
 10557                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10558                                  
 10559                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10560                                  ; set time of last access, and reset default values in the dpt.
 10561                                  ;
 10562                                  ;	  note: trashes (at least) si

 10564

 10566                                  done:

 10570 000009E8 E8FD01                  		call	set_tim

 10573                                  diddle_back:

 10593                                  
 10594                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10595                                  
 10596                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10597                                  ;read the number of sectors specified in ax, 
 10598                                  ;handling track boundaries
 10599                                  ;es:di -> bds for this drive
 10600                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10601

 10603                                  block:

 10607                                  					; fnon_removable
 10608 00000A21 740D                    		jz	short block_floppy ;
 10609                                  
 10610                                  ; check	to see if multi	track operation	is allowed. if not
 10611                                  ; we have to go	to the block_floppy below to break up the operation.
 10612                                  
 10613 00000A23 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 10614                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:multrk_flag, 80h ; multrk_on
 10615 00000A28 7406                    		jz	short block_floppy
 10616 00000A2A E82900                  		call	Disk
 10617 00000A2D 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
 10618 00000A2F C3                      		retn
 10619                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10620                                  
 10621                                  block_floppy:
 10622                                  
 10623                                  ; read at most 1 track worth. perform minimization at sector / track
 10624                                  				
 10625 00000A30 268A4D13                		mov	cl, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10626 00000A34 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 10627 00000A36 2A0E[3101]              		sub	cl, [cursec]
 10628 00000A3A 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
 10629 00000A3C 39C8                    		cmp	ax, cx
 10630 00000A3E 7302                    		jnb	short gotmin
 10631 00000A40 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 10632                                  
 10633                                  gotmin:
 10634                                  
 10635                                  ; ax is the requested number of sectors to read
 10636                                  ; cx is the number that we can do on this track
 10637                                  					
 10638 00000A42 50                      		push	ax
 10639 00000A43 51                      		push	cx
 10640 00000A44 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 10641 00000A46 E80D00                  		call	Disk
 10642 00000A49 59                      		pop	cx
 10643 00000A4A 58                      		pop	ax
 10644                                  
 10645                                  ; cx is the number of sectors just transferred
 10646                                  
 10647 00000A4B 29C8                    		sub	ax, cx		; reduce sectors-remaining by last i/o
 10648 00000A4D D0E1                    		shl	cl, 1
 10649 00000A4F 00CF                    		add	bh, cl		; adjust transfer address
 10650 00000A51 EBC5                    		jmp	short block
 10651                                  dskerr_brdg:				
 10652 00000A53 E9EC00                  		jmp	dskerr
 10653                                  
 10654                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10655                                  
 10656                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10657                                  
 10658                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10659                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 10660                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 10661                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 10662                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 10663                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 10664                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 10665                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 10666                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10667                                  
 10668                                  		 ; 19/10/2022
 10669                                  Disk:
 10670                                  
 10671                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 10672                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 10673                                  
 10674 00000A56 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 10675                                  					; set up retry count
 10676 00000A59 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1	;
 10677                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 10678 00000A5E 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10679 00000A60 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 10680 00000A63 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10681 00000A65 BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 10682                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 10683 00000A68 892E[3205]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 10684 00000A6C 892E[3405]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 10685 00000A70 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 10686                                  ;retry:
 10687                                  ; 09/12/2022
 10688                                  _retry:					
 10689 00000A74 50                      		push	ax
 10690 00000A75 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 10691 00000A79 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10692 00000A7E 740B                    		jz	short disk_not_mini
 10693 00000A80 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 10694                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 10695 00000A85 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 10696 00000A87 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 10697                                  					; add hidden trks.
 10698                                  disk_not_mini:				
 10699 00000A8B D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10700 00000A8D D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10701 00000A8F 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 10702 00000A93 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 10703 00000A95 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 10704 00000A97 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 10705 00000A9B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 10706                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10707 00000A9F 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 10708 00000AA4 7413                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 10709                                  
 10710                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 10711                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 10712                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 10713                                  
 10714 00000AA6 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 10715 00000AAB 740A                    		jz	short do_writej
 10716 00000AAD 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 10717 00000AB0 7407                    		jz	short do_fast
 10718 00000AB2 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 10719 00000AB5 7402                    		jz	short do_fast
 10720                                  do_writej:	
 10721                                  
 10722                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 10723                                  			
 10724 00000AB7 EB56                    		jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 10725                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10726                                  
 10727                                  do_fast:				
 10728 00000AB9 E8FC00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 10729                                  
 10730                                  testerr:				
 10731 00000ABC 7295                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 10732                                  
 10733                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 10734                                  
 10735 00000ABE 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 10736 00000AC2 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10737                                  no_set:
 10738                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 10739 00000AC6 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 10740 00000ACC 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 10741                                  noverify:				
 10742 00000ACE 58                      		pop	ax
 10743                                  
 10744                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 10745                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 10746                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 10747                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 10748                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 10749                                  
 10750 00000ACF 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10751                                  					; fnon_removable
 10752 00000AD4 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 10753 00000AD6 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 10754 00000ADB 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 10755                                  its_removable:				
 10756 00000ADD 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 10757 00000AE0 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 10758 00000AE2 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 10759 00000AE6 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 10760 00000AE8 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 10761 00000AEC 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10762                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 10763 00000AF0 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 10764 00000AF2 C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 10765 00000AF7 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 10766 00000AFB FEC6                    		inc	dh
 10767 00000AFD 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 10768 00000B01 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 10769 00000B03 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10770 00000B05 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 10771                                  noxor:					
 10772 00000B09 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 10773                                  disk_ret:				
 10774 00000B0D F8                      		clc
 10775 00000B0E C3                      		retn
 10776                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10777                                  
 10778                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10779                                  
 10780                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10781                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 10782                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 10783                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10784                                  
 10785                                  do_write:				
 10786 00000B0F 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 10787 00000B13 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 10788 00000B15 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10789 00000B19 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 10790                                  
 10791                                  do_norm:				
 10792 00000B1B E87500                  		call	normspeed
 10793 00000B1E EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 10794                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10795                                  
 10796                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10797                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 10798                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10799                                  
 10800                                  doverify:				
 10801 00000B20 58                      		pop	ax
 10802 00000B21 50                      		push	ax
 10803 00000B22 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 10804 00000B24 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 10805 00000B27 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 10806                                  
 10807                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 10808                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 10809                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 10810                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 10811                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 10812                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 10813                                  
 10814 00000B29 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 10815 00000B2C 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 10816 00000B2E FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 10817 00000B32 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 10818 00000B34 E84405                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 10819 00000B37 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 10820                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10821                                  
 10822                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 10823 00000B39 E83F05                  		call	ResetDisk
 10824 00000B3C FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 10825 00000B40 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 10826                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10827                                  
 10828                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10829                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 10830                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 10831                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10832                                  
 10833                                  dskerr:					
 10834 00000B42 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 10835 00000B47 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 10836 00000B49 E8220D                  		call	checkio
 10837                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 10838 00000B4C 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 10839 00000B51 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 10840 00000B53 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 10841 00000B56 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 10842                                  dochkagain:				
 10843 00000B5B E8AA00                  		call	again
 10844                                  dskerr0:				
 10845 00000B5E 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 10846 00000B60 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10847                                  					; fnon_removable
 10848 00000B65 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 10849 00000B67 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 10850 00000B6A 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 10851                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 10852 00000B6C 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 10853 00000B6F 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 10854 00000B71 C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 10855                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 10856                                  dskerr1:				
 10857 00000B77 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 10858                                  		;jmp	retry
 10859                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10860 00000B78 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 10861                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10862                                  
 10863                                  write_fault_err:			
 10864 00000B7B BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 10865                                  					; for write fault error.
 10866 00000B7E EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 10867                                  
 10868                                  		; fall into harderr
 10869                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10870                                  
 10871                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 10872                                  
 10873                                  harderr:				
 10874 00000B80 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 10875                                  harderr2:				
 10876 00000B83 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 10877                                  					; force a media check through rom
 10878 00000B88 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 10879 00000B8C 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 10880                                  
 10881                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 10882                                  
 10883                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 10884                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10885 00000B90 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 10886                                  
 10887                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10888                                  
 10889                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 10890                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 10891                                  
 10892                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10893                                  normspeed:
 10894 00000B93 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10895 00000B98 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 10896 00000B9A 06                      		push	es
 10897 00000B9B 50                      		push	ax
 10898 00000B9C A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 10899 00000B9F C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 10900 00000BA3 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10901 00000BA7 58                      		pop	ax
 10902 00000BA8 07                      		pop	es
 10903 00000BA9 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 10904 00000BAC 06                      		push	es
 10905 00000BAD C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 10906 00000BB1 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10907                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 10908 00000BB6 07                      		pop	es
 10909 00000BB7 C3                      		retn
 10910                                  
 10911                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10912                                  
 10913                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 10914                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 10915                                  
 10916                                  fastspeed:		
 10917 00000BB8 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 10918                                  					; ftoobig
 10919 00000BBD 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 10920 00000BBF 06                      		push	es
 10921 00000BC0 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 10922 00000BC4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 10923 00000BC6 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 10924 00000BCA 07                      		pop	es
 10925 00000BCB C3                      		retn
 10926                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10927                                  
 10928                                  notready:				
 10929 00000BCC F9                      		stc
 10930 00000BCD B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 10931 00000BCF C3                      		retn
 10932                                  
 10933                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10934                                  
 10935                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 10936                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 10937                                  
 10938                                  maperror:	
 10939 00000BD0 51                      		push	cx
 10940 00000BD1 06                      		push	es
 10941 00000BD2 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 10942 00000BD3 07                      		pop	es
 10943 00000BD4 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 10944 00000BD6 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 10945 00000BD9 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 10946                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 10947 00000BDC BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 10948 00000BDF F2AE                    		repne scasb
 10949                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10950 00000BE1 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 10951                                  					; get translation
 10952                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 10953                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 10954 00000BE4 07                      		pop	es
 10955 00000BE5 59                      		pop	cx
 10956 00000BE6 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 10957 00000BE7 C3                      		retn
 10958                                  
 10959                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10960                                  
 10961                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 10962                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 10963                                  
 10964                                  set_tim:		
 10965 00000BE8 50                      		push	ax
 10966 00000BE9 E88EF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 10967                                  
 10968                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 10969                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 10970                                  
 10971 00000BEC 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10972 00000BF0 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 10973 00000BF2 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10974                                  		;jz	short done_set
 10975                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10976 00000BF6 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 10977                                  setaccess:				
 10978 00000BF8 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 10979 00000BFD 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10980 00000C01 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10981                                  done_set:				
 10982 00000C05 F8                      		clc
 10983                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 10984 00000C06 58                      		pop	ax
 10985 00000C07 C3                      		retn
 10986                                  
 10987                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10988                                  
 10989                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 10990                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 10991                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 10992                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 10993                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 10994                                  
 10995                                  again:	
 10996 00000C08 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 10997 00000C0B 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 10998 00000C0E 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 10999                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11000 00000C10 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11001 00000C11 C3                      		retn
 11002                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11003                                  
 11004                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11005 00000C12 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11006 00000C14 C3                      		retn
 11007                                  
 11008                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11009

 11017                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11018                                  ;
 11019                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11020                                  ;
 11021                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11022                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11023                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11024                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11025                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11026                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11027                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11028                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 11029                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11030                                  
 11031                                  		; generic ioctl dispatch tables
 11032                                  
 11033                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 11034                                  
 11035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11036 00000C15 00                      		db 0
 11037                                  
 11038                                  ; 09/12/2022 
 11039                                  %if 0
 11040                                  
 11041                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11042                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11043                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 11044                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack
 11045                                  		dw 0CA3h	 	; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11046                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11047                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11048                                  		dw 119Ah	; 66h	; GetMediaId
 11049                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11050                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 11051                                  
 11052                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2
 11053                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 11054                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 11055                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 11056                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11057                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc

 11113                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11114                                  ;
 11115                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11116                                  ;
 11117                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11118                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11119                                  ;	subfunctions.
