 11129 00000C4D 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11130                                  					; RAWIO

 11132 00000C56 07                      		pop	es

 11141                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh

 11399                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11400                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11401                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11402                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11403                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11404                                  ;
 11405                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11406                                  ;
 11407                                  ; output:
 11408                                  ;	for status call:
 11409                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11410                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11411                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11412                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11413                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11414                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11415                                  ;
 11416                                  ;	for format track:
 11417                                  ;		carry set if error
 11418                                  ;
 11419                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11420                                  
 11421                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11422                                  
 11423                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11424                                  FormatTrack:
 11425 00000D97 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 11426 00000D9B C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 11427 00000D9E F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11428                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT
 11429 00000DA1 740E                    		jz	short DoFormatTrack
 11430 00000DA3 1E                      		push	ds
 11431                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11432 00000DA4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11433                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11434 00000DA9 E83902                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 11435 00000DAC 1F                      		pop	ds
 11436 00000DAD 8807                    		mov	[bx], al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11437 00000DAF F8                      		clc
 11438 00000DB0 C3                      		retn
 11439                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11440

 11570                                  
 11571                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11572                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11573                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11574                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11575                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11576                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11577                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11578                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11579                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 11580                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 11581                                  		; register.
 11582                                  
 11583                                  					; Special function requested?

 11684                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11685                                  
 11686                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11687                                  
 11688                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11689                                  ;
 11690                                  ; TrackIo:
 11691                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11692                                  ;
 11693                                  ;   input:
 11694                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11695                                  ;		  3 = write
 11696                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11697                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11698                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11699                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11700                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11701                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11702                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11703                                  ;
 11704                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11705                                  
 11706                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11707                                  		
 11708                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11709                                  TrackIo:	
 11710                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11711 00000EF0 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11712 00000EF4 E844F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11713 00000EF7 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11714                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11715 00000EFC 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11716 00000EFE 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11717 00000EFF 51                      		push	cx
 11718 00000F00 E896FA                  		call	iosetup
 11719 00000F03 59                      		pop	cx
 11720 00000F04 58                      		pop	ax
 11721                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the

 11723 00000F08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11724 00000F0A D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11725 00000F0C 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11726                                  
 11727                                  		; WE WANT:
 11728                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11729                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11730                                  		
 11731 00000F0E BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11732                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11733 00000F11 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11734                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11735                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11736 00000F16 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11737                                  		
 11738 00000F18 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11739                                  ionextsector:

 11741 00000F1B 52                      		push	dx
 11742 00000F1C 46                      		inc	si
 11743 00000F1D 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11744                                  					; the track table
 11745 00000F1E AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11746 00000F1F A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11747                                  
 11748                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11749                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11750                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11751                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11752                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11753                                  		
 11754                                  		; 12/12/2022

 11762                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 11763 00000F2E 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 11764 00000F30 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 11765 00000F34 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11766 00000F36 E81DFB                  		call	Disk
 11767 00000F39 5A                      		pop	dx
 11768 00000F3A 59                      		pop	cx
 11769 00000F3B F8                      		clc
 11770 00000F3C C3                      		retn
 11771                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11772                                  
 11773                                  IoRemovable:				
 11774 00000F3D AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 11775                                  					; table	and save it

 11784 00000F4D 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]

 11786 00000F51 1F                      		pop	ds

 11791                                  					; sector size

 11794 00000F5F 01C3                    		add	bx, ax

 11803                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 11804                                  NoNeedDone:

 11806                                  NoNeedDone2:
 11807 00000F70 C3                      		retn
 11808                                  
 11809                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11810                                  
 11811                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11812                                  ;
 11813                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 11814                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 11815                                  ; are permissible.
 11816                                  ;
 11817                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 11818                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 11819                                  ; All other registers preserved
 11820                                  ;
 11821                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11822                                  
 11823                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:	
 11824 00000F71 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 11825                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 11826 00000F74 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 11827 00000F76 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 11828 00000F78 C3                      		retn
 11829                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11830                                  
 11831                                  OneK:

 11850                                  ; SetDASD
 11851                                  ;
 11852                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 11853                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 11854                                  ;
 11855                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds

 11860                                  SetDasd:	
 11861 00000F84 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;

 11865 00000F8B 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h

 11887                                  GotBig:

 11914                                  DasdHasBeenSet:

 11919                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11920                                  
 11921                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11922                                  
 11923                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11924                                  ;
 11925                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 11926                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 11927                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 11928                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 11929                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 11930                                  ;
 11931                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 11932                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 11933                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 11934                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 11935                                  ;
 11936                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 11937                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 11938                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 11939                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 11940                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 11941                                  ;
 11942                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11943                                  
 11944                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11945                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 11946 00000FE5 51                      		push	cx
 11947 00000FE6 52                      		push	dx
 11948                                  
 11949                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 11950                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 11951                                  
 11952 00000FE7 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11953 00000FEC 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 11954 00000FEE 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 11955 00000FF0 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11956 00000FF5 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 11957 00000FF7 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 11958                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11959                                  
 11960                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 11961 00000FF9 06                      		push	es
 11962 00000FFA 56                      		push	si
 11963 00000FFB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 11964 00000FFF 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11965                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 11966                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 11967 00001004 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 11968 00001008 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 11969                                  
 11970                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 11971                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 11972                                  
 11973 0000100C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]

 11977                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 11978 00001013 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]

 11982 0000101D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1

 11984 00001021 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11985 00001025 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11986 00001029 06                      		push	es
 11987 0000102A 1E                      		push	ds

 11989 0000102C 57                      		push	di
 11990 0000102D B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 11991 0000102F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 11992                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 11993 00001031 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 11994 00001033 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11995 00001038 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 11996 0000103A 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 11997 0000103B 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 11998 0000103F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11999                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12000                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12001 00001044 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12002 00001048 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12003 0000104C 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]

 12065                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12066                                  ;
 12067                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12068                                  ;
 12069                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12070                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12071                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12072                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12073                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12074                                  ;

 12082                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12083 00001083 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12084                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12085 00001088 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12086 0000108A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12087                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12088 0000108C C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12089                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12090 00001091 58                      		pop	ax

 12097                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12098                                  ;
 12099                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12100                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12101                                  ;
 12102                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12103                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12104                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12105                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12106                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12107                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12108                                  ;
 12109                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12110                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12111                                  ;
 12112                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12113                                  
 12114                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12115                                  ToRom:	
 12116 00001093 53                      		push	bx
 12117 00001094 56                      		push	si
 12118

 12120                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12121                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]

 12137

 12162 000010E9 5B                      		pop	bx

 12167                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12168                                  
 12169                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12170                                  
 12171                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12172                                  ;
 12173                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12174                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12175                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12176                                  ;
 12177                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12178                                  
 12179                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12180                                  ioctl_getown:
 12181 000010EB E8DDF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12182 000010EE 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12183                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12184 000010F2 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12185                                  ownloop:				
 12186 000010F6 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12187 000010FA 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12188                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12189 000010FC 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12190                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12191                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12192 00001101 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12193                                  getnextBDS:				
 12194 00001103 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12195 00001106 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12196                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12197                                  
 12198                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12199                                  ;
 12200                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12201                                  ; in al to al.
 12202                                  ;
 12203                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12204                                  
 12205                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12206                                  ioctl_setown:
 12207 00001108 E8C0F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12208 0000110B C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12209                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12210 00001110 E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12211 00001113 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12212                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12213                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12214                                  
 12215                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12216                                  ;
 12217                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12218                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12219                                  ;
 12220                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12221                                  
 12222                                  exitown:				
 12223 00001118 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12224                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12225 0000111A 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12226                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12227                                  					; fi_am_mult

 12230                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12231                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12232 00001125 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12233                                  exitnomult:				
 12234 00001127 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12235 0000112B 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12236                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12237                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12238                                  		; cf=0
 12239                                  		;clc
 12240 0000112E C3                      		retn

 12249                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.

 12255                                  RestoreOldDpt:

 12290                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12291                                  
 12292                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12293                                  
 12294                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12295                                  ;	get media id
 12296                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12297                                  ;
 12298                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12299                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12300                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12301                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12302                                  ;
 12303                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12304                                  ;
 12305                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12306                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12307                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12308                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12309                                  ;
 12310                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12311                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12312                                  ;
 12313                                  ; LOGIC:
 12314                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12315                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12316                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12317                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12318                                  ;
 12319                                  ; {
 12320                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12321                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12322                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12323                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12324                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12325                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12326                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12327                                  ;		};
 12328                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12329                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12330                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12331                                  ;		};
 12332                                  ;	else
 12333                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12334                                  ;
 12335                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12336                                  
 12337                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12338                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12339                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12340                                  
 12341                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12342                                  GetMediaId:
 12343 0000115D E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12344 00001160 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12345 00001164 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12346 00001169 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12347 0000116C 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12348                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12349 0000116E 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12350                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12351 00001173 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12352                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12353 00001175 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12354 00001178 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12355                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12356                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12357 0000117B 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12358 0000117D C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12359 00001181 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12360                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12361 00001185 46                      		inc	si
 12362                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12363                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12364 00001186 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12365 00001189 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12366                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12367                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12368 0000118C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12369                                  	
 12370                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12371                                  		; cf = 0
 12372                                  		;clc
 12373                                  
 12374 0000118E C3                      		retn

 12377                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12378 0000118F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12379 00001191 F9                      		stc
 12380                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12381 00001192 C3                      		retn
 12382                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12383                                  
 12384                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12385                                  
 12386                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12387                                  ;  set media id
 12388                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12389                                  
 12390                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12391                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12392                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12393                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12394                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12395                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12396                                  ;
 12397                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12398                                  ;
 12399                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12400                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12401                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12402                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12403                                  ;
 12404                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12405                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12406                                  ;
 12407                                  ; logic:
 12408                                  ;
 12409                                  ; {
 12410                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12411                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12412                                  ;	BootIo;
 12413                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12414                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12415                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12416                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12417                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12418                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12419                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12420                                  ;		};
 12421                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12422                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12423                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12424                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12425                                  ;		};
 12426                                  ;	else
 12427                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12428                                  ;
 12429                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12430                                  
 12431                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12432                                  SetMediaId:
 12433 00001193 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12434 00001196 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12435                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12436 0000119A 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12437 0000119C C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12438 000011A1 52                      		push	dx
 12439 000011A2 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12440 000011A5 5A                      		pop	dx
 12441 000011A6 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12442                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12443 000011A8 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12444                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12445 000011AD 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12446 000011AF 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12447                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12448 000011B4 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12449 000011B6 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12450 000011B7 57                      		push	di
 12451 000011B8 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12452 000011B9 07                      		pop	es
 12453 000011BA BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12454 000011BD C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12455 000011C1 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12456 000011C4 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12457 000011C7 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12458                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12459                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12460 000011CA F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12461 000011CC 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12462 000011CD 1F                      		pop	ds
 12463 000011CE 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12464 000011CF 07                      		pop	es
 12465 000011D0 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12466 000011D3 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12467 000011D5 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12468 000011DA E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12469 000011DD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12470                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12471                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12472 000011E2 C3                      		retn
 12473                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12474                                  
 12475                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12476 000011E3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12477 000011E5 F9                      		stc
 12478                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12479 000011E6 C3                      		retn
 12480                                  
 12481                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12482                                  
 12483                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12484                                  
 12485                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12486                                  ;	BootIo
 12487                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12488                                  ;
 12489                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12490                                  ;
 12491                                  ; input :
 12492                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12493                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12494                                  ;
 12495                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12496                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12497                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12498                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12499                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12500                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12501                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12502                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12503                                  ;
 12504                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12505                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12506                                  ;
 12507                                  ; logic:
 12508                                  ;
 12509                                  ; {
 12510                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12511                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12512                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12513                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12514                                  ; }
 12515                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12516                                  
 12517                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12518                                  BootIo:	
 12519 000011E7 06                      		push	es
 12520 000011E8 57                      		push	di
 12521 000011E9 53                      		push	bx
 12522 000011EA 1E                      		push	ds
 12523 000011EB 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12524                                  
 12525                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12526                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12527                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12528                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12529                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12530                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12531                                  
 12532 000011EC BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12533 000011EF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12534 000011F1 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12535 000011F5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12536 000011F8 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12537 000011FB 5B                      		pop	bx
 12538 000011FC 5F                      		pop	di
 12539 000011FD 07                      		pop	es
 12540 000011FE C3                      		retn
 12541                                  
 12542                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12543                                  
 12544                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12545                                  
 12546                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12547                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12548                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12549                                  ;
 12550                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12551                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12552                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12553                                  ; history in the flags.
 12554                                  ;
 12555                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12556                                  ;
 12557                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12558                                  ;
 12559                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12560                                  ;
 12561                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12562                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12563                                  ;
 12564                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12565                                  
 12566                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12567 000011FF 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12568 00001203 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12569 00001205 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12570                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12571 00001207 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12572                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12573                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12574 0000120C 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12575 0000120E 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12576 00001213 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12577 00001215 E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12578 00001218 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12579                                  
 12580                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12581                                  
 12582 0000121A B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12583 0000121C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12584                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12585                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12586 0000121E 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12587 00001220 53                      		push	bx
 12588 00001221 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12589                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12590                                  					; physical drive
 12591 00001224 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12592 00001227 5B                      		pop	bx
 12593                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12594 00001228 C3                      		retn
 12595                                  
 12596                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12597                                  
 12598                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12599                                  
 12600                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12601                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12602                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12603                                  ;
 12604                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12605                                  ;
 12606                                  ; INPUT :
 12607                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12608                                  ;
 12609                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12610                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12611                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12612                                  
 12613                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12614                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12615 00001229 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12616 0000122D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12617                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12618                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12619 00001230 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12620                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12621 00001232 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12622                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12623                                  					; unformatted_media
 12624 00001237 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12625 00001239 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12626                                  
 12627                                  GafDone:				
 12628 0000123B 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12629 0000123E C3                      		retn
 12630                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12631                                  
 12632                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12633                                  
 12634                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12635                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12636                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12637                                  ;
 12638                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12639                                  ;
 12640                                  ; input :
 12641                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12642                                  ;
 12643                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12644                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12645                                  
 12646                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12647                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12648 0000123F C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12649 00001243 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12650                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12651 00001246 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12652                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12653                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12654 0000124B 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12655 0000124F 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12656                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12657 00001251 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12658                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12659                                  					; unformatted_media
 12660                                  saf_Done:				
 12661 00001256 C3                      		retn
 12662                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12663                                  
 12664                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12665                                  
 12666                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12667                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12668                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12669                                  ;
 12670                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12671                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12672                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12673                                  ;
 12674                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12675                                  
 12676                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12677                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12678 00001257 06                      		push	es
 12679 00001258 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12680 0000125C 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12681                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12682 00001260 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12683                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12684 00001262 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12685 00001264 0E                      		push	cs
 12686 00001265 07                      		pop	es
 12687 00001266 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12688                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12689 00001269 BF[3A0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12690                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12691                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12692 0000126C 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12693 0000126E F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12694 00001270 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12695 00001272 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12696                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12697                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12698                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12699                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12700                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12701                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12702                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12703 00001275 07                      		pop	es
 12704                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12705                                  		; cf = 0
 12706                                  		;clc
 12707 00001276 C3                      		retn
 12708                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12709                                  nosupport:				
 12710 00001277 07                      		pop	es
 12711 00001278 E95AEE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12712                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12713                                  
 12714                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12715                                  
 12716                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12717                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12718                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12719                                  ;
 12720                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12721                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12722                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12723                                  ;	    drive)
 12724                                  ;
 12725                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12726                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12727                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12728                                  ;
 12729                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12730                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12731                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12732                                  ;
 12733                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12734                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12735                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12736                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12737                                  ;
 12738                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12739                                  ;
 12740                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12741                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12742                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12743                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12744                                  ; 
 12745                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12746                                  
 12747                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12748                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12749 0000127B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12750 0000127F C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12751                                  		; 10/10/2022
 12752                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 12753 00001282 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12754 00001284 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 12755                                  		;
 12756 00001286 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12757                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 12758                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12759                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 12760 0000128A B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 12761                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 12762 0000128C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 12763 0000128E 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 12764 00001290 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 12765                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 12766 00001292 FEC8                    		dec	al
 12767 00001294 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 12768 00001296 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12769 00001298 0404                    		add	al, 4
 12770 0000129A 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 12771 0000129C 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12772 0000129E 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 12773 000012A0 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 12774                                  GotMediaType:				
 12775 000012A2 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 12776                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12777                                  		; cf = 0
 12778                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 12779 000012A5 C3                      		retn
 12780                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12781                                  
 12782                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 12783 000012A6 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 12784 000012A9 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 12785 000012AB B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 12786 000012AD 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 12787 000012B0 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 12788                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 12789 000012B2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 12790                                  SenseErrExit:				
 12791 000012B4 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 12792 000012B6 F9                      		stc
 12793 000012B7 C3                      		retn
 12794                                  
 12795                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12796                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12797                                  		;db    0
 12798                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12799                                  
 12800                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12801                                  
 12802                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12803                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 12804                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12805                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12806                                  
 12807                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 12808                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 12809                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 12810                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 12811                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 12812                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 12813                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 12814                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 12815                                  ;
 12816                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 12817                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 12818                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 12819                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 12820                                  ;
 12821                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 12822                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 12823                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 12824                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 12825                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 12826                                  ;
 12827                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 12828                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 12829                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 12830                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 12831                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 12832                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 12833                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 12834                                  
 12835                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 12836                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 12837                                  
 12838                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12839                                  
 12840                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 12841 000012B8 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 12842 000012BB 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 12843 000012BD 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 12844 000012C0 743B                    		jz	short mine
 12845                                  
 12846                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 12847                                  
 12848 000012C2 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 12849 000012C5 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 12850 000012C7 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 12851 000012CA 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 12852 000012CC E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 12853                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12854                                  
 12855                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 12856 000012CF CF                      		iret
 12857                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12858                                  
 12859                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 12860 000012D0 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 12861 000012D1 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 12862                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 12863                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 12864                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 12865 000012D3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 12866                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12867                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 12868                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 12869                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 12870                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 12871 000012D8 FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 12872 000012DC FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 12873 000012E0 FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 12874 000012E4 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 12875                                  
 12876                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 12877                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 12878                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 12879                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 12880 000012E8 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 12881 000012EC A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 12882 000012EF 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 12883 000012F3 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 12884                                  
 12885 000012F7 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 12886 000012F8 5B                      		pop	bx
 12887 000012F9 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 12888 000012FA 5A                      		pop	dx
 12889 000012FB 58                      		pop	ax
 12890                                  i2f_iret:				
 12891 000012FC CF                      		iret
 12892                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12893                                  
 12894                                  mine:					
 12895 000012FD 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 12896 000012FF 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 12897 00001301 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 12898 00001303 7504                    		jnz	short disp_func
 12899 00001305 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 12900 00001307 EBF3                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 12901                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12902                                  
 12903                                  disp_func:				
 12904 00001309 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
 12905 0000130B 7418                    		jz	short do_subfun_01
 12906 0000130D 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3			; get bds vector?
 12907 0000130F 7424                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector
 12908                                  
 12909                                  ; set up pointer to request packet
 12910                                  
 12911 00001311 1E                      		push	ds
 12912 00001312 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022	
 12913                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12914                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]
 12915                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12916                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav, bx
 12917                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav+2, es
 12918 00001317 891E[1200]              		mov	[ptrsav], bx
 12919 0000131B 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 12920 0000131F 1F                      		pop	ds
 12921                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry
 12922                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12923                                  		;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry		
 12924 00001320 EA[9608]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 12925                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 12926                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 12927                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 12928                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 12929                                  
 12930                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12931                                  
 12932                                  do_subfun_01:				
 12933 00001325 06                      		push	es
 12934 00001326 1E                      		push	ds
 12935 00001327 1E                      		push	ds
 12936 00001328 07                      		pop	es
 12937                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12938 00001329 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]	
 12939                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12940                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data
 12941 0000132E E8C303                  		call	install_bds
 12942 00001331 1F                      		pop	ds
 12943 00001332 07                      		pop	es
 12944 00001333 EBC7                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 12945                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12946                                  
 12947                                  do_get_bds_vector:
 12948                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12949 00001335 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]			
 12950                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12951 0000133A C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 12952                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 12953                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022				
 12954 0000133E EBBC                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 12955                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12956                                  
 12957                                  ; 17/10/2022
 12958                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12959                                  
 12960                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 12961                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 12962                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 12963                                  
 12964                                  win386call:				
 12965 00001340 1E                      		push	ds
 12966 00001341 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12967                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12968                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 12969 00001346 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 12970                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 12971 00001348 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 12972 0000134A 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 12973                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 12974 0000134C 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 12975                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12976 0000134E F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 12977                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 12978 00001351 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 12979                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 12980 00001353 8026[CE08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 12981 00001358 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 12982                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12983                                  
 12984                                  Win386Init:	
 12985                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12986 0000135A F6C201                  		test	dl, 1			
 12987                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it win386 or win286 dos extender?
 12988 0000135D 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 12989                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 12990 0000135F 800E[CE08]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 12991                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 12992                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 12993 00001364 891E[9C08]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 12994 00001368 8C06[9E08]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 12995                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 12996 0000136C BB[9A08]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 12997 0000136F 1E                      		push	ds
 12998 00001370 07                      		pop	es
 12999                                  win_iret:				
 13000 00001371 1F                      		pop	ds
 13001                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022	
 13002 00001372 EB88                    		jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 13003                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13004                                  
 13005                                  handle_multmult:			
 13006 00001374 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 13007 00001376 7515                    		jnz	short try_2
 13008 00001378 1E                      		push	ds
 13009 00001379 E84700                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13010                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13011                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 13012                                  		;dec	bx
 13013 0000137C BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 13014 0000137F 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 13015 00001381 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 13016 00001383 F7D3                    		not	bx
 13017 00001385 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 13018 00001387 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 13019 00001389 43                      		inc	bx
 13020                                  try_1:					
 13021 0000138A 1F                      		pop	ds
