 14139                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14140                                  
 14141                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14142                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14143                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14144                                  ;
 14145                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14146                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14147                                  
 14148                                  mediacheck:	
 14149 000017B3 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14150 000017B6 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14151 000017B8 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14152 000017BB 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14153 000017BD E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14154 000017C0 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14155 000017C2 50                      		push	ax
 14156 000017C3 52                      		push	dx
 14157 000017C4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14158                                  					; set logical drive number
 14159 000017C8 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14160 000017CA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14161                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14162                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14163 000017CC 5A                      		pop	dx
 14164 000017CD 58                      		pop	ax
 14165 000017CE 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14166 000017D0 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14167                                  
 14168                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14169                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14170                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14171                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14172                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14173                                  ; status.
 14174                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14175 000017D3 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14176 000017D7 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14177                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14178                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14179                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14180                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14181 000017DB 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14182                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14183                                  
 14184                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14185                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14186                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14187                                  
 14188 000017DD 50                      		push	ax
 14189 000017DE 51                      		push	cx
 14190 000017DF 52                      		push	dx
 14191 000017E0 E870ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14192 000017E3 5A                      		pop	dx
 14193 000017E4 59                      		pop	cx
 14194 000017E5 58                      		pop	ax
 14195 000017E6 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14196 000017E8 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14197                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14198 000017EA 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14199                                  mediaret:				
 14200 000017EC C3                      		retn
 14201                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14202                                  
 14203                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14204                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14205                                  ; or write.
 14206                                  
 14207                                  mediadovolid:				
 14208 000017ED E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14209 000017F0 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14210 000017F2 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14211 000017F5 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14212 000017F7 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14213                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14214                                  
 14215                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14216                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14217                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14218                                  ; dos.
 14219                                  ;
 14220                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14221                                  
 14222                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14223                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14224                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14225                                  
 14226                                  checklatchio:	
 14227                                  
 14228                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14229                                  			
 14230 000017FA E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14231 000017FD 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14232                                  
 14233                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14234                                  
 14235 000017FF E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14236 00001802 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14237                                  
 14238                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14239                                  ; expensive verification.
 14240                                  
 14241 00001804 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14242 00001807 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14243 00001809 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14244 0000180C 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14245 0000180E 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14246 00001810 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14247 00001812 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14248                                  checklatchret:				
 14249 00001815 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14250                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14251 00001818 F9                      		stc
 14252 00001819 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14253                                  checkret:				
 14254 0000181A C3                      		retn
 14255                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14256                                  
 14257                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14258                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14259                                  ;
 14260                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14261                                  
 14262                                  checkfatvid:				
 14263 0000181B E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14264 0000181E 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14265 00001820 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14266                                  
 14267                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14268                                  
 14269                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14270                                  
 14271                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14272                                  
 14273                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14274                                  ;
 14275                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14276                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14277                                  ;
 14278                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14279                                  ;
 14280                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14281                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14282                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14283                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14284                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14285                                  ;
 14286                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14287                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14288                                  ; routine.)
 14289                                  ;
 14290                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14291                                  
 14292                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14293                                  check_vid:
 14294                                  
 14295                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14296                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14297                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14298                                  
 14299 00001822 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14300                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14301                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14302 00001827 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14303 00001829 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14304 0000182C 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14305 0000182E 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14306 00001830 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14307                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14308 00001835 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14309                                  					; if not fat system
 14310 00001837 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14311 0000183A 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14312 0000183C E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14313 0000183F BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14314                                  					; definitely changed
 14315 00001842 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14316                                  
 14317 00001844 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14318                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14319 00001845 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14320                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14321                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14322                                  		;clc
 14323                                  checkfatret:				
 14324 00001848 C3                      		retn
 14325                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14326                                  
 14327                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14328                                  changed_drv:
 14329 00001849 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14330 0000184A C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14331                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14332 0000184F C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14333                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14334                                  
 14335                                  ; extended id check
 14336                                  
 14337                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14338                                  
 14339                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14340                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14341                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14342                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14343                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14344                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14345                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14346                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14347                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14348                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14349                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14350                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14351                                  ;
 14352                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14353                                  
 14354                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14355                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14356 00001850 50                      		push	ax
 14357                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14358                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14359 00001851 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14360 00001854 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14361 00001858 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14362 0000185A A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14363 0000185D 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14364 00001861 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14365 00001863 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14366                                  					; don't know
 14367 00001865 58                      		pop	ax
 14368 00001866 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14369                                  					; reset the flag
 14370                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14371                                  
 14372                                  ext_changed:				
 14373 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14374 00001869 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14375                                  					; disk changed!
 14376                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14377                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14378                                  		;clc
 14379 0000186C EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14380                                  
 14381                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14382                                  
 14383                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14384                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14385                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14386                                  ;
 14387                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14388                                  
 14389                                  checkio:				
 14390 0000186E 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14391 00001871 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14392 00001873 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14393 00001876 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14394 00001878 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14395 0000187B 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14396 0000187D E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14397 00001880 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14398 00001882 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14399 00001884 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14400 00001886 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14401 00001887 C3                      		retn
 14402                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14403                                  
 14404                                  checkioerr:				
 14405 00001888 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14406                                  
 14407                                  checkioret:				
 14408 0000188B F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14409 0000188C E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14410                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14411                                  
 14412                                  no_error_map:				
 14413 0000188F E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14414                                  
 14415                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14416                                  
 14417                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14418                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14419                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14420                                  
 14421                                  returnvid:		
 14422 00001892 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14423                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14424 00001895 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14425 00001898 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14426 0000189A F9                      		stc
 14427 0000189B C3                      		retn
 14428                                  
 14429                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14430                                  
 14431                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14432                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14433                                  ;
 14434                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14435                                  ; **trashes si**
 14436                                  
 14437                                  media_set_vid:				
 14438 0000189C BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14439                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14440                                  
 14441                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14442                                  
 14443                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14444                                  
 14445                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14446                                  
 14447                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14448                                  vid_into_packet:
 14449 0000189F 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14450 000018A0 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14451 000018A4 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14452 000018A7 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14453 000018A9 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14454 000018AC 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14455 000018AF 1F                      		pop	ds
 14456                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14457 000018B0 C3                      		retn
 14458                                  
 14459                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14460                                  
 14461                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14462                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14463                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14464                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14465                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14466                                  ;
 14467                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14468                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14469                                  ;
 14470                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14471                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14472                                  ;		carry set
 14473                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14474                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14475                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14476                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14477                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14478                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14479                                  ;
 14480                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14481                                  
 14482                                  hidensity:
 14483                                  
 14484                                  ; check for correct drive
 14485                                  		
 14486                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14487 000018B1 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14488                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14489                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14490 000018B6 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14491                                  
 14492                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14493                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14494                                  
 14495 000018B8 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14496 000018BD 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14497                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14498                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14499 000018BF 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14500 000018C2 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14501                                  
 14502                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14503                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14504                                  
 14505 000018C4 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14506                                  					; ffOther
 14507 000018C9 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14508 000018CB 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14509                                  					; ff288
 14510 000018D0 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14511 000018D2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14512 000018D4 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14513                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14514                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14515 000018D7 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14516                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14517                                  					; 2 sides
 14518 000018DA BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14519                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14520                                  					; & head max
 14521 000018DD 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14522 000018E0 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14523                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14524                                  
 14525                                  Is720K:					
 14526 000018E3 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14527 000018E6 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14528                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14529                                  
 14530                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14531                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14532                                  		;retn
 14533                                  
 14534                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14535                                  
 14536                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14537                                  
 14538                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14539                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14540                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14541                                  ;
 14542                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14543                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14544                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14545                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14546                                  ;
 14547                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14548                                  ;
 14549                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14550                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14551                                  
 14552                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14553 000018E9 06                      		push	es
 14554 000018EA 57                      		push	di
 14555                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14556                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14557 000018EB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14558                                  
 14559                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14560                                  
 14561                                  scan_bds:				
 14562 000018EF 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14563 000018F3 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14564                                  
 14565                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14566                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14567                                  
 14568 000018F5 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14569                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14570                                  get_next_bds:				
 14571 000018F9 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14572                                  					; go to	next bds
 14573 000018FC 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14574 000018FF 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14575 00001901 5F                      		pop	di
 14576 00001902 07                      		pop	es
 14577 00001903 C3                      		retn
 14578                                  
 14579                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14580                                  
 14581                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14582                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14583                                  ;
 14584                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14585                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14586                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14587                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14588                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14589                                  
 14590                                  checkromchange:	
 14591                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14592                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14593 00001904 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14594                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14595                                  					; fchanged
 14596 00001909 C3                      		retn
 14597                                  
 14598                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14599                                  
 14600                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14601                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14602                                  ;
 14603                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14604                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14605                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14606                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14607                                  
 14608                                  resetchanged:	
 14609                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14610                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14611 0000190A 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14612                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14613                                  					; ~fchanged
 14614 0000190F C3                      		retn
 14615                                  
 14616                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14617                                  
 14618                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14619                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14620                                  ;
 14621                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14622                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14623                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14624                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14625                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14626                                  
 14627                                  haschange:
 14628                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14629                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14630 00001910 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14631                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14632                                  					; fchangeline
 14633 00001915 C3                      		retn
 14634                                  
 14635                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14636                                  
 14637                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14638                                  
 14639                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14640                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14641                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14642                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14643                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14644                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14645                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14646                                  
 14647                                  ; set_volume_id
 14648                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14649                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14650                                  ;
 14651                                  ;   on entry:
 14652                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14653                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14654                                  ;
 14655                                  ;   on exit:
 14656                                  ;	carry clear:
 14657                                  ;	   successful call
 14658                                  ;	carry set
 14659                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14660                                  
 14661                                  set_volume_id:				
 14662 00001916 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14663 00001917 50                      		push	ax
 14664 00001918 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14665 0000191B 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14666 0000191D E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14667 00001920 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14668 00001922 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14669 00001925 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14670                                  setvret:				
 14671                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14672                                  		; cf = 0
 14673                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14674 00001928 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14675 00001929 5A                      		pop	dx
 14676 0000192A C3                      		retn
 14677                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14678                                  
 14679                                  seterr:					
 14680 0000192B 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14681 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14682 0000192D C3                      		retn
 14683                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14684 0000192E 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14685                                  
 14686                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14687                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14688                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14689                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14690                                  
 14691                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14692                                  
 14693                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14694                                  
 14695                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14696                                  ;
 14697                                  ;   on entry:
 14698                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14699                                  ;
 14700                                  ;   on exit:
 14701                                  ;	carry clear
 14702                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14703                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14704                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14705                                  ;
 14706                                  ;	carry set:
 14707                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14708                                  
 14709                                  read_volume_id:
 14710 00001930 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14711 00001931 51                      		push	cx
 14712 00001932 53                      		push	bx
 14713 00001933 50                      		push	ax
 14714 00001934 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14715 00001935 57                      		push	di
 14716 00001936 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14717 00001937 07                      		pop	es
 14718 00001938 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14719 0000193B BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14720 0000193E B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14721 00001941 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14722 00001943 5F                      		pop	di
 14723 00001944 07                      		pop	es
 14724 00001945 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14725                                  					; # of fats
 14726 00001949 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14727                                  					; sectors / fat
 14728 0000194D F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14729 0000194F 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14730                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14731                                  					;
 14732                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14733                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14734 00001953 2EA3[2E19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14735                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14736                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14737 00001957 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14738                                  					; # root dir entries
 14739 0000195B B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14740 0000195D D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14741 0000195F 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14742                                  next_sec:				
 14743 00001961 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14744 00001962 2EA1[2E19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14745                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14746                                  					; get sector #
 14747 00001966 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14748                                  					; sectors / track
 14749 0000196A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14750 0000196C F7F1                    		div	cx
 14751                                  
 14752                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14753                                  
 14754 0000196E 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14755                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14756 0000196F 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14757 00001971 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14758 00001973 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14759                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14760 00001977 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14761 00001979 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14762 0000197B E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14763                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14764 0000197E 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14765 00001980 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14766 00001983 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14767                                  fvid_loop:				
 14768 00001985 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14769 00001988 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14770 0000198A 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14771 0000198D 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14772 0000198F 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14773 00001992 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14774                                  ent_loop:				
 14775 00001994 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14776 00001997 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14777 00001999 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14778 0000199A 2EFF06[2E19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14779                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14780                                  					; next sector
 14781 0000199F E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14782                                  notfound:				
 14783 000019A1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14784 000019A3 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14785                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14786                                  
 14787                                  found_vid:				
 14788 000019A5 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14789 000019A6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14790 000019A8 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14791 000019A9 57                      		push	di
 14792 000019AA 1E                      		push	ds
 14793 000019AB 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14794 000019AC BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14795 000019AF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14796                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14797 000019B2 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14798 000019B4 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14799 000019B6 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14800 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14801 000019B9 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14802 000019BA 07                      		pop	es
 14803                                  fvid_ret:				
 14804 000019BB 58                      		pop	ax
 14805                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14806                                  		; cf = 0
 14807                                  		;clc
 14808                                  rvidret:				
 14809 000019BC 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14810 000019BD 59                      		pop	cx
 14811 000019BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14812 000019BF C3                      		retn
 14813                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14814                                  
 14815                                  no_vid:					
 14816 000019C0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14817 000019C1 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14818                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14819                                  
 14820                                  readviderr:				
 14821 000019C3 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14822 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14823 000019C5 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14824                                  
 14825                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14826                                  
 14827                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14828                                  ;
 14829                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14830                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14831                                  
 14832                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14833 000019C7 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14834 000019C8 56                      		push	si
 14835 000019C9 51                      		push	cx
 14836 000019CA BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14837                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14838 000019CD 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14839                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14840 000019D0 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14841 000019D3 FC                      		cld
 14842 000019D4 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14843 000019D6 59                      		pop	cx
 14844 000019D7 5E                      		pop	si
 14845 000019D8 5F                      		pop	di
 14846 000019D9 C3                      		retn
 14847                                  
 14848                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14849                                  
 14850                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14851                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14852                                  ;
 14853                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14854                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14855                                  
 14856                                  check_volume_id:	
 14857 000019DA 57                      		push	di
 14858 000019DB 51                      		push	cx
 14859 000019DC BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14860                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14861 000019DF 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14862                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14863 000019E2 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14864 000019E5 FC                      		cld
 14865 000019E6 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14866 000019E8 59                      		pop	cx
 14867 000019E9 5F                      		pop	di
 14868 000019EA C3                      		retn
 14869                                  
 14870                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14871                                  
 14872                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14873                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 14874                                  ;
 14875                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 14876                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 14877                                  ;
 14878                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 14879                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 14880                                  ;
 14881                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 14882                                  
 14883                                  fat_check:		
 14884 000019EB 50                      		push	ax
 14885 000019EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 14886 000019EE A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 14887 000019F1 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14888                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 14889 000019F5 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 14890 000019F7 4E                      		dec	si
 14891                                  okret1:					
 14892 000019F8 58                      		pop	ax
 14893 000019F9 C3                      		retn
 14894                                  
 14895                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14896                                  
 14897                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14898                                  		;times 7 db 0
 14899                                  
 14900                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 14901                                  
 14902                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14903                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 14904                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 14905                                  
 14906                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14907                                  
 14908                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14909                                  		;db 0
 14910                                  
 14911                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 14912                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 14913                                  
 14914                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 14915 000019FA 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 14916                                  %endif
 14917                                  
 14918                                  ;align 16
 14919                                  
 14920                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14921                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 14922                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 14923                                  ; 13/12/2022
 14924                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 14925                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 14926                                  
 14927                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------

 14930                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 14931                                  ; ============================================================================
 14932                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 14935                                  ; %include sysinit5.s	; 09/12/2022

 14938                                  ;=============================================================================
 14939                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT 
 14940                                  ;=============================================================================
 14941                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14942                                  
 14943                                  section .SYSINIT vstart=0
 14944                                  
 14945                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 14946                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 14947                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14948                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 31/12/2022))
 14949                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14950                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 14951                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14952                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 14953                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14954                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit5.s -l sysinit5.lst -o SYSINIT5.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 14955                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14956                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 14957                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14958                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 14959                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 14960                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14961                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 14962                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 14963                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 14964                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 14965                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 14966                                  
 14967                                  ; 21/10/2022
 14968                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14969                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 14970                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 14971                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 14972                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14973                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 14974                                  
 14975                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 14976                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 14977                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 14978                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 14979                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 14980                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 14981                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 14982                                  ;
 14983                                  ;
 14984                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 14985                                  ;
 14986                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 14987                                  ;
 14988                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 14989                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 14990                                  ;
 14991                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 14992                                  ;
 14993                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 14994                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 14995                                  ;
 14996                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 14997                                  ;
 14998                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 14999                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 15000                                  ;value.
 15001                                  ;
 15002                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 15003                                  ;
 15004                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 15005                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 15006                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 15007                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 15008                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 15009                                  ;
 15010                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 15011                                  ;
 15012                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 15013                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 15014                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 15015                                  ;
 15016                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 15017                                  ;
 15018                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 15019                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15020                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 15021                                  ;
 15022                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 15023                                  ;
 15024                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 15025                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15026                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 15027                                  ;
 15028                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 15029                                  ;
 15030                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 15031                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 15032                                  ;
 15033                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 15034                                  ;
 15035                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 15036                                  ;
 15037                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 15038                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 15039                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 15040                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 15041                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 15042                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 15043                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 15044                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 15045                                  ;memory.
 15046                                  ;NOTES:
 15047                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 15048                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 15049                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 15050                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 15051                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 15052                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 15053                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 15054                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 15055                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 15056                                  
 15057                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15058                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 15059                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15060                                  
 15061                                  ;include version.inc
 15062                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15063                                  
 15064                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 15065                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 15066                                  
 15067                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 15068                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 15069                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 15070                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 15071                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 15072                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 15073                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 15074                                  
 15075                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 15076                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15077                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 15078                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 15079                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15080                                  
 15081                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 15082                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15083                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 15084                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 15085                                  
 15086                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 15087                                  
 15088                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 15089                                  				; currently 0.
 15090                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 15091                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 15092                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 15093                                  
 15094                                  ;      if1
 15095                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 15096                                  ;      endif
 15097                                  
 15098                                         ;******************************
 15099                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 15100                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 15101                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 15102                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 15103                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 15104                                         ;******************************
 15105                                  
 15106                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15107                                  ; device definitions
 15108                                  
 15109                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 15110                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 15111                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 15112                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 15113                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 15114                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 15115                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 15116                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 15117                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 15118                                  
 15119                                  ; The device table list has the form:
 15120                                  struc	SYSDEV
 15121 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 15122 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 15123 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 15124 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 15125 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 15126                                  .size:
 15127                                  endstruc
 15128                                  
 15129                                  ;Static Reguest Header
 15130                                  struc	SRHEAD
 15131 00000000 ??                      .REQLEN:	resb 1		;Length in bytes of request block
 15132 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 15133 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 15134 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 15135 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 15136                                  .size:
 15137                                  endstruc
 15138                                  
 15139                                  ;Status word masks
 15140                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 15141                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 15142                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 15143                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 15144                                  WRECODE EQU     0
 15145                                  
 15146                                  ;Function codes
 15147                                  DEVINIT EQU     0               ;Initialization
 15148                                  DINITHL EQU     26              ;Size of init header
 15149                                  DEVMDCH EQU     1               ;Media check
 15150                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 15151                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 15152                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 15153                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 15154                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 15155                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 15156                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 15157                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 15158                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 15159                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header
 15160                                  DEVIFL  EQU     7               ;Input flush
 15161                                  DFLSHL  EQU     15              ;Size of flush header
 15162                                  DEVWRT  EQU     8               ;Write
 15163                                  DEVWRTV EQU     9               ;Write with verify
 15164                                  DEVOST  EQU     10              ;Output status
 15165                                  DEVOFL  EQU     11              ;Output flush
