 29998                                  
 29999                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30000                                  ;*** hideUMB - marks as HIDDEN all FREE elements in UMB passed as AL
 30001                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30002                                  ; ENTRY:    AL must indicate a valid UMB; 0==conv && is invalid.
 30003                                  ; EXIT:     None; free elements in UMB marked as hidden
 30004                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30005                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30006                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30007                                  
 30008                                  hideUMB:
 30009                                  	push	ax
 30010                                  	push	es
 30011                                  
 30012                                  	call	findUMB		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30013                                  	jc	short huX
 30014                                  
 30015                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 30016                                  ; HU10--ES - MCB inside UMB; if it's a system MCB,
 30017                                  ;            we're not in the same UMB, so exit.
 30018                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 30019                                  
 30020                                  hu10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30021                                  	jz	short huX	; If it is, we've finished the UMB.
 30022                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30023                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30024                                  	jnz	short hu20
 30025                                  
 30026                                  	call	hideMCB
 30027                                  hu20:	
 30028                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30029                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ;'Z'
 30030                                  	jz	short huX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30031                                  
 30032                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30033                                  	mov     ax,es
 30034                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30035                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30036                                  	inc     ax
 30037                                  	mov     es,ax
 30038                                  
 30039                                  	jmp	short hu10
 30040                                  huX:	
 30041                                  	pop	es
 30042                                  	pop	ax
 30043                                  	retn
 30044                                  
 30045                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30046                                  ;*** isTiny - returns with ZF set if user didn't specify /S
 30047                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30048                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30049                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if user DIDN'T specify /S
 30050                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30051                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30052                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30053                                  
 30054                                  isTiny:
 30055                                  	push	ax
 30056                                  
 30057                                  	;getdata al, fUmbTiny
 30058                                  	;
 30059                                  	;push	ds
 30060                                  	;push	cs
 30061                                  	;pop	ds
 30062                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny]
 30063                                  	;pop	ds
 30064                                  
 30065                                  	mov	al,[cs:fUmbTiny]		
 30066                                  
 30067                                  	or	al,al
 30068                                  	pop	ax
 30069                                  	retn
 30070                                  
 30071                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30072                                  ;*** isFreeMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FREE
 30073                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30074                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30075                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is free, else !ZF
 30076                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30077                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30078                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30079                                  
 30080                                  ;isFreeMCB:
 30081                                  ;	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30082                                  ;	retn
 30083                                  
 30084                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30085                                  ;*** hideMCB - marks as HIDDEN the MCB at ES:0
 30086                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30087                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30088                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as HIDDEN
 30089                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30090                                  ; USES:     None
 30091                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30092                                  
 30093                                  hideMCB:
 30094                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30095                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0], 'HI' ; 4948h
 30096                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2], 'DD' ; 4444h
 30097                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4], 'EN' ; 4E45h
 30098                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6], '  ' ; 2020h	
 30099                                  	retn
 30100                                  
 30101                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30102                                  ;*** unHideMCB - marks as FREE the MCB at ES:0
 30103                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30104                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30105                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as FREE
 30106                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30107                                  ; USES:     None
 30108                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30109                                  
 30110                                  unHideMCB:
 30111                                  	push	ax
 30112                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],FreePSPOwner ; 0
 30113                                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30114                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30115                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30116                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30117                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30118                                  	pop	ax
 30119                                  	retn
 30120                                  
 30121                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30122                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30123                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30124                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30125                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30126                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30127                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30128                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30129                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30130                                  
 30131                                  findUMB:
 30132                                  	push	ax
 30133                                  	push	cx
 30134                                  	push	dx
 30135                                  
 30136                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30137                                  
 30138                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30139                                  
 30140                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30141                                  	mov	es,ax
 30142                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30143                                  
 30144                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30145                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30146                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30147                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30148                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30149                                  
 30150                                  fu10:	
 30151                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30152                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30153                                  
 30154                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30155                                  	jnz	short fu20
 30156                                  
 30157                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30158                                  fu20:	
 30159                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30160                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30161                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30162                                  
 30163                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30164                                  	mov     ax,es
 30165                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30166                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30167                                  	inc     ax
 30168                                  	mov     es,ax
 30169                                  
 30170                                  	jmp	short fu10
 30171                                  fuE:	
 30172                                  	stc
 30173                                  fuX:
 30174                                  	pop	dx
 30175                                  	pop	cx
 30176                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 30177                                  	retn
 30178                                  
 30179                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30180                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 30181                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30182                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30183                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 30184                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 30185                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30186                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30187                                  
 30188                                  BigFree:
 30189                                  	push	bx
 30190                                  	push	cx
 30191                                  
 30192                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 30193                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 30194                                  
 30195                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 30196                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 30197                                  
 30198                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30199                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30200                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30201                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30202                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30203                                  
 30204                                  bf10:	
 30205                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30206                                  	jz	short bf30
 30207                                  
 30208                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30209                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30210                                  	jnz	short bf20
 30211                                  
 30212                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30213                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30214                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 30215                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30216                                  
 30217                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30218                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30219                                  	mov	cx,ax
 30220                                  
 30221                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30222                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30223                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30224                                  
 30225                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30226                                  	mov     ax,es
 30227                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30228                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30229                                  	inc     ax
 30230                                  	mov     es,ax
 30231                                  
 30232                                  	jmp	short bf10
 30233                                  
 30234                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30235                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30236                                  	or	bx,bx
 30237                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30238                                  bfE:	
 30239                                  	stc
 30240                                  bfX:
 30241                                  	pop	cx
 30242                                  	pop	bx
 30243                                  	retn
 30244                                  
 30245                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30246                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30247                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30248                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30249                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30250                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30251                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30252                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30253                                  
 30254                                  isSpecified:
 30255                                  	push	ax
 30256                                  
 30257                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30258                                  	mov	bl,al
 30259                                  
 30260                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30261                                  	;
 30262                                  	;push	ds
 30263                                  	;push	cs
 30264                                  	;pop	ds
 30265                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30266                                  	;pop	ds
 30267                                  	
 30268                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30269                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30270                                  
 30271                                  	pop	ax
 30272                                  	retn
 30273                                  
 30274                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30275                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30276                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30277                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30278                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30279                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30280                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30281                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30282                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30283                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30284                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30285                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30286                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30287                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30288                                  
 30289                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30290                                  
 30291                                  shrinkMCB:
 30292                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30293                                  	push	bx
 30294                                  	push	cx
 30295                                  	push	es
 30296                                  
 30297                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30298                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30299                                  
 30300                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30301                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30302                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30303                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30304                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30305                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 30306                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30307                                  
 30308                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30309                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30310                                  
 30311                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30312                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30313                                  
 30314                                  	add	ax,bx
 30315                                  	inc	ax
 30316                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30317                                  
 30318                                  	mov	ax,cx
 30319                                  	sub	ax,bx
 30320                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30321                                  	; ax > 0
 30322                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30323                                  
 30324                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30325                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30326                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 30327                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 30328                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30329                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 30330                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 30331                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 30332                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 30333                                  
 30334                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30335                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 30336                                  
 30337                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30338                                  	; cf=0
 30339                                  	;clc
 30340                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30341                                  	;jmp	short smX
 30342                                  smE:	
 30343                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30344                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 30345                                  	;stc
 30346                                  smX:	
 30347                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 30348                                  	pop	es
 30349                                  	pop	cx
 30350                                  	pop	bx
 30351                                  	retn
 30352                                  
 30353                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30354                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 30355                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30356                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 30357                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 30358                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30359                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 30360                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30361                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 30362                                  ;
 30363                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 30364                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 30365                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 30366                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 30367                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 30368                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 30369                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 30370                                  ;       Endif
 30371                                  ;    Endif
 30372                                  ; Endif
 30373                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 30374                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 30375                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 30376                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 30377                                  ;    ENDIF
 30378                                  ; ENDIF
 30379                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30380                                  
 30381                                  _hideUMB_:
 30382                                  	push	bx
 30383                                  	push	dx
 30384                                  	push	es
 30385                                  
 30386                                  	mov	al,cl
 30387                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 30388                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30389                                  
 30390                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 30391                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 30392                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 30393                                  
 30394                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 30395                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 30396                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 30397                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 30398                                  
 30399                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 30400                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 30401                                  
 30402                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 30403                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 30404                                  
 30405                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 30406                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 30407                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 30408                                  hu_10:	
 30409                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 30410                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30411                                  
 30412                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 30413                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 30414                                  
 30415                                  	mov	dx,es
 30416                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 30417                                  
 30418                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 30419                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 30420                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 30421                                  
 30422                                  	xor	dx,dx
 30423                                  hu_30:	
 30424                                  	mov	al,cl
 30425                                  
 30426                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 30427                                  
 30428                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 30429                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 30430                                  
 30431                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 30432                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 30433                                  hu_X:	
 30434                                  	pop	es
 30435                                  	pop	dx
 30436                                  	pop	bx
 30437                                  	retn
 30438                                  
 30439                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30440                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 30441                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30442                                  ; Entry:  None
 30443                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 30444                                  ; Error:  None
 30445                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30446                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30447                                  
 30448                                  UnFreeze:
 30449                                  	push	ax
 30450                                  	push	es
 30451                                  
 30452                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30453                                  	jc	short ufX
 30454                                  
 30455                                  	mov	es,ax
 30456                                  
 30457                                  ; ------------------------------
 30458                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30459                                  ; ------------------------------
 30460                                  
 30461                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 30462                                  	jnz	short uf20
 30463                                  	call	unHideMCB
 30464                                  uf20:	
 30465                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30466                                  
 30467                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30468                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30469                                  
 30470                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30471                                  	mov     ax,es
 30472                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30473                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30474                                  	inc     ax
 30475                                  	mov     es,ax
 30476                                  
 30477                                  	jmp	short uf10
 30478                                  ufX:	
 30479                                  	pop	es
 30480                                  	pop	ax
 30481                                  	retn
 30482                                  
 30483                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30484                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 30485                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30486                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30487                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 30488                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30489                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30490                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30491                                  
 30492                                  isFrozMCB:
 30493                                  	;push	ax
 30494                                  
 30495                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30496                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30497                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 30498                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30499                                  
 30500                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 30501                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 30502                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30503                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30504                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30505                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 30506                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30507                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30508                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30509                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30510                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30511                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30512                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30513                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30514                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30515                                  ifmX:	
 30516                                  	;pop	ax
 30517                                  	retn
 30518                                  
 30519                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30520                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 30521                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30522                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30523                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 30524                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30525                                  ; USES:     None
 30526                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30527                                  
 30528                                  frezMCB:
 30529                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30530                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30531                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30532                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30533                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30534                                  	retn
 30535                                  
 30536                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30537                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 30538                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30539                                  ; Entry:  None
 30540                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30541                                  ; Error:  None
 30542                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30543                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30544                                  
 30545                                  FreezeUM:
 30546                                  	push	ax
 30547                                  	push	cx
 30548                                  	push	dx
 30549                                  	push	es
 30550                                  
 30551                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30552                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30553                                  
 30554                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30555                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30556                                  
 30557                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30558                                  	mov	es,ax
 30559                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30560                                  
 30561                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30562                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30563                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30564                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30565                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30566                                  
 30567                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30568                                  	jnz	short fum20
 30569                                  
 30570                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30571                                  fum20:	
 30572                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 30573                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 30574                                  
 30575                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 30576                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30577                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 30578                                  
 30579                                  	call	frezMCB
 30580                                  fum30:	
 30581                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30582                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30583                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30584                                  
 30585                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30586                                  	mov     ax,es
 30587                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30588                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30589                                  	inc     ax
 30590                                  	mov     es,ax
 30591                                  	
 30592                                  	jmp	short fum10
 30593                                  
 30594                                  fumX:	pop	es
 30595                                  	pop	dx
 30596                                  	pop	cx
 30597                                  	pop	ax
 30598                                  	retn
 30599                                  
 30600                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30601                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 30602                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30603                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30604                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 30605                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30606                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 30607                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30608                                  
 30609                                  UmbTest:
 30610                                  	push	ax
 30611                                  	push	bx
 30612                                  	push	ds
 30613                                  	push	es
 30614                                  
 30615                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 30616                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 30617                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 30618                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 30619                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 30620                                  
 30621                                  	pop	es
 30622                                  	pop	ds
 30623                                  	pop	bx
 30624                                  	pop	ax
 30625                                  	retn
 30626                                  
 30627                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30628                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 30629                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30630                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30631                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 30632                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30633                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30634                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30635                                  
 30636                                  WalkMem:
 30637                                  	push	ax ; ?
 30638                                  	push	bx ; ?
 30639                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 30640                                  		   	
 30641                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30642                                  	int	21h
 30643                                  
 30644                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 30645                                  	mov	es,ax
 30646                                  
 30647                                  ; ------------------------------
 30648                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 30649                                  ; ------------------------------
 30650                                  
 30651                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30652                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 30653                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 30654                                  
 30655                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 30656                                  
 30657                                  	mov     bx,es
 30658                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 30659                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30660                                  	inc     bx
 30661                                  	mov     es,bx
 30662                                  		
 30663                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 30664                                  um20:	
 30665                                  	mov	ax,es
 30666                                  
 30667                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 30668                                  
 30669                                  	pop	es ; ?
 30670                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 30671                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 30672                                  	retn
 30673                                  
 30674                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30675                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 30676                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30677                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30678                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30679                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30680                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30681                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30682                                  
 30683                                  hl_unlink:
 30684                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30685                                  
 30686                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 30687                                  	;
 30688                                  	;push	ds
 30689                                  	;push	cs
 30690                                  	;pop	ds
 30691                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 30692                                  	;pop	ds
 30693                                  
 30694                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 30695                                  
 30696                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30697                                  	int	21h
 30698                                  	retn
 30699                                  
 30700                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30701                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30702                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30703                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30704                                  
 30705                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 30706                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 30707                                  
 30708                                  ;   Modification log:
 30709                                  ;
 30710                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 30711                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 30712                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 30713                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 30714                                  
 30715                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 30716                                  
 30717                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30718                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 30719                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30720                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 30721                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 30722                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 30723                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30724                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 30725                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30726                                  
 30727                                  UnHideUMBs:
 30728                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 30729                                  
 30730                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30731                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 30732                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 30733                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 30734                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 30735                                  ;    every command execution.
 30736                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30737                                  
 30738                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 30739                                  	;
 30740                                  	;push	ds
 30741                                  	;push	cs
 30742                                  	;pop	ds
 30743                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 30744                                  	;pop	ds	
 30745                                  
 30746                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 30747                                  
 30748                                  	or	al,al
 30749                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 30750                                  
 30751                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 30752                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 30753                                  	retn			; that.
 30754                                  uhu10:	
 30755                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 30756                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 30757                                  
 30758                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 30759                                  	;
 30760                                  	;push	es
 30761                                  	;push	cs
 30762                                  	;pop	es
 30763                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 30764                                  	;pop	ds	
 30765                                  
 30766                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 30767                                  
 30768                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 30769                                  
 30770                                  	pop	ax
 30771                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30772                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 30773                                  	retn
 30774                                  
 30775                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30776                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 30777                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30778                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30779                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30780                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30781                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30782                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30783                                  
 30784                                  he_unlink:
 30785                                  	xor	bh, bh
 30786                                  
 30787                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 30788                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 30789                                  
 30790                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30791                                  	int	21h
 30792                                  	retn
 30793                                  
 30794                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30795                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 30796                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30797                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30798                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 30799                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 30800                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30801                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30802                                  
 30803                                  FreeUMBs:
 30804                                  	push	ax
 30805                                  	push	es
 30806                                  
 30807                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30808                                  	jc	short fusX
 30809                                  
 30810                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 30811                                  fus10:	
 30812                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30813                                  	jnz	short fus20
 30814                                  	call	freeMCB
 30815                                  fus20:	   
 30816                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30817                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30818                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 30819                                  
 30820                                  	mov	ax,es
 30821                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30822                                  	inc	ax
 30823                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30824                                  
 30825                                  	jmp	short fus10
 30826                                  fusX:	
 30827                                  	pop	es
 30828                                  	pop	ax
 30829                                  	retn
 30830                                  
 30831                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30832                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 30833                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30834                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30835                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 30836                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30837                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30838                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30839                                  
 30840                                  isHideMCB:
 30841                                  	;push	ax
 30842                                  
 30843                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 30844                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 30845                                  
 30846                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 30847                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 30848                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 30849                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30850                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30851                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 30852                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 30853                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30854                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30855                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30856                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30857                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30858                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30859                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30860                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30861                                  ihm_x:	
 30862                                  	;pop	ax
 30863                                  	retn
 30864                                  
 30865                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30866                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 30867                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30868                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30869                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 30870                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30871                                  ; USES:     AX
 30872                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30873                                  
 30874                                  freeMCB:
 30875                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30876                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 30877                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30878                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30879                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30880                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30881                                  	retn
 30882                                  
 30883                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30884                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30885                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30886                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30887                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30888                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30889                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30890                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30891                                  
 30892                                  HeadUmb:
 30893                                  	; 13/05/2019
 30894                                  
 30895                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30896                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 30897                                  	;push	es
 30898                                  	;push	bx ; *
 30899                                  
 30900                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30901                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30902                                  
 30903                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30904                                  	int	21h
 30905                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 30906                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 30907                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 30908                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 30909                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30910                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 30911                                  
 30912                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 30913                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 30914                                  xhu_e:	
 30915                                  	;stc
 30916                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 30917                                  xhu_x:	
 30918                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 30919                                  	;pop	es	
 30920                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 30921                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 30922                                  	retn
 30923                                  
 30924                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30925                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 30926                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30927                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30928                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 30929                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30930                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 30931                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30932                                  
 30933                                  linkumb:
 30934                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 30935                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 30936                                  
 30937                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 30938                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 30939                                  
 30940                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30941                                  	mov	bx,1
 30942                                  	int	21h
 30943                                  lumbX:
 30944                                  	retn
 30945                                  
 30946                                  %endif
 30947                                  
 30948                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30949                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 30950                                  
 30951                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30952                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30953                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30954                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30955                                  
 30956                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30957                                  ;
 30958                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 30959                                  ;
 30960                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 30961                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 30962                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 30963                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 30964                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 30965                                  ;
 30966                                  ;	Output : none
 30967                                  ;
 30968                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 30969                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 30970                                  ;
 30971                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30972                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 30973                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 30974                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 30975                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 30976                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30977                                  
 30978                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30979                                  InitDevLoad:
 30980                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30981                                  	; ds = cs
 30982 00002818 803E[071F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 30983                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 30984                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 30985 0000281D 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 30986                                  
 30987                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30988                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 30989                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 30990                                  ;
 30991                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 30992                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 30993                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 30994                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 30995                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 30996                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 30997                                  ;
 30998                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 30999                                  ;
 31000                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31001                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31002                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31003                                  ;	pushf
 31004                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31005                                  ;	popf
 31006                                  ;
 31007                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31008                                  ;
 31009                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31010                                  
 31011                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31012                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31013                                  InitForConv:
 31014                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31015                                  	; ds = cs
 31016 0000281F E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31017                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31018 00002822 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31019 00002824 E84F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31020 00002827 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31021 0000282A 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31022                                  					;  in low memory
 31023                                  InitForHi:
 31024                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31025                                  	; ds = cs
 31026                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31027                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31028                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31029 0000282C A1[FD1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31030 0000282F 8B16[F91E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31031 00002833 0316[FB1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31032 00002837 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31033                                  
 31034                                  InitForLo:
 31035                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31036                                  	; ds = cs
 31037                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31038 00002839 C606[071F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31039                                  initforlo_x:
 31040                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31041                                  	; ds = cs
 31042                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31043                                  					;  we are loading low
 31044                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31045                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31046 0000283E A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31047 00002841 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31048                                  idl1:
 31049 00002845 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31050                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31051                                  	; ds = cs
 31052                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31053                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31054                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31055                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31056 00002848 A3[EC1E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31057 0000284B 8916[EE1E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31058 0000284F C706[F01E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31059 00002855 A3[F21E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31060 00002858 C3                      	retn
 31061                                  
 31062                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31063                                  ;
 31064                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31065                                  ;
 31066                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31067                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31068                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31069                                  ;		   current UMB
 31070                                  ;
 31071                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31072                                  
 31073                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31074                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31075                                  	; ds = cs
 31076                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31077                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31078                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31079 00002859 A1[FB1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31080 0000285C 0306[F91E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31081 00002860 2B06[FD1E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31082                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31083                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31084                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31085                                  	;stc
 31086                                  	;retn
 31087                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31088 00002864 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31089 00002867 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31090                                  spcinumb1:
 31091 00002869 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31092                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31093                                  	; ds = cs
 31094 0000286A 3B06[EA1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31095                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31096                                  spcinumb2:
 31097 0000286E C3                      	retn
 31098                                  
 31099                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31100                                  ;
 31101                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31102                                  ;
 31103                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31104                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31105                                  ;
 31106                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31107                                  
 31108                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31109                                  ;
 31110                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31111                                  ;	push	ds
 31112                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31113                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31114                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31115                                  ;	pop	ds
 31116                                  ;
 31117                                  ;	inc	ax
 31118                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31119                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31120                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31121                                  ;	retn
