 31123                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31124                                  ;
 31125                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31126                                  ;
 31127                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31128                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31129                                  ;		 the device.
 31130                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31131                                  ;
 31132                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31133                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31134                                  ;	UMB.
 31135                                  ;
 31136                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31137                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31138                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31139                                  ;
 31140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31141                                  
 31142                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31143                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31144                                  
 31145                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31146                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31147                                  	; ds = cs
 31148 0000286F BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31149 00002872 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31150 00002875 CD21                    	int	21h
 31151                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31152                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31153                                  
 31154 00002877 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31155 00002879 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31156                                  
 31157 0000287B 4B                      	dec	bx
 31158                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31159                                  	; ds = cs
 31160 0000287C 391E[EA1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31161                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31162 00002880 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31163 00002882 43                      	inc	bx
 31164                                  
 31165 00002883 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31166 00002886 CD21                    	int	21h
 31167 00002888 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31168                                  
 31169                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31170                                  	;dec	ax
 31171                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31172                                  	;
 31173                                  PrepareMark:
 31174 0000288A 1E                      	push	ds
 31175 0000288B 48                      	dec	ax
 31176 0000288C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31177 0000288E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31178 00002894 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31179 0000289A 40                      	inc	ax
 31180 0000289B 1F                      	pop	ds
 31181                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31182                                  	; ds = cs
 31183                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31184                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31185                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31186 0000289C 891E[FB1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31187 000028A0 A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31188 000028A3 A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31189                                  	;
 31190                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31191                                  	; cf=0
 31192                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31193 000028A6 C3                      	retn
 31194                                  gufd_err:
 31195 000028A7 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31196                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31197                                  	; ds = cs
 31198                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31199                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31200                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31201 000028A9 A3[FB1E]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31202 000028AC A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31203 000028AF A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31204 000028B2 F9                      	stc
 31205 000028B3 C3                      	retn

 31207                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31208                                  ;
 31209                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31210                                  ;
 31211                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31212                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31213                                  ;
 31214                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31215                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31216                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31217                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31218                                  ;
 31219                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31220                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31221                                  ;
 31222                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31223                                  
 31224                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31225                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31226                                  
 31227                                  DevSetMark:
 31228 000028B4 06                      	push	es
 31229 000028B5 57                      	push	di
 31230 000028B6 1E                      	push	ds
 31231 000028B7 56                      	push	si
 31232 000028B8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31233 000028BA 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31234 000028C0 40                      	inc	ax
 31235 000028C1 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31236                                  
 31237                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31238                                  
 31239 000028C5 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31240 000028C6 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31241                                  
 31242 000028CB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31243 000028CD FC                      	cld
 31244                                  dsm_again:
 31245 000028CE AC                      	lodsb
 31246 000028CF 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31247 000028D1 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31248 000028D3 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31249 000028D5 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31250                                  isit_slash:
 31251 000028D7 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31252 000028D9 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31253 000028DB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31254 000028DD EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31255                                  isit_null:
 31256 000028DF 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31257 000028E1 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31258 000028E3 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31259                                  
 31260 000028E5 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31261 000028E8 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31262                                  dsm_next_char:
 31263 000028EB AC                      	lodsb
 31264 000028EC 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31265 000028EE 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31266 000028F0 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31267 000028F2 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31268 000028F4 AA                      	stosb
 31269 000028F5 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31270                                  blankout:
 31271 000028F7 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31272 000028F9 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31273 000028FB F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31274                                  dsm_exit:
 31275 000028FD 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31276 000028FE 5E                      	pop	si
 31277 000028FF 1F                      	pop	ds
 31278 00002900 5F                      	pop	di
 31279 00002901 07                      	pop	es
 31280 00002902 C3                      	retn

 31284                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31285                                  ;
 31286                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31287                                  ;
 31288                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31289                                  ;
 31290                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31291                                  ;	in DevSize
 31292                                  ;
 31293                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31294                                  
 31295                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31296                                  SizeDevice:
 31297                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31298                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *

 31300 00002904 06                      	push	es
 31301 00002905 1F                      	pop	ds

 31303 00002908 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31304 0000290B CD21                    	int	21h
 31305 0000290D 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31306

 31308 00002911 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31309 00002914 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx

 31311 00002918 CD21                    	int	21h

 31313 0000291C 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31314 0000291F 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31315 00002922 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31316 00002926 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31317 00002928 2EC706[EA1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31318                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31319 0000292F EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31320                                  szdev1:
 31321 00002931 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31322 00002933 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31323 00002935 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31324 00002937 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31325 00002939 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31326                                  	;
 31327                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31328 0000293B 2E3B06[081F]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]

 31331 00002940 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2

 31338                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31339                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31340                                  	; cf=0
 31341                                  	;clc
 31342                                  sd_close:

 31344                                  					;  carry flag
 31345 0000294C B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31346 0000294F CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31347 00002951 9D                      	popf
 31348                                  sd_err:
 31349                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31350                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *

 31662                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31663                                  ;
 31664                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31665                                  ;
 31666                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31667                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31668                                  ;
 31669                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31670                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31671                                  ;
 31672                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31673                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31674                                  ;
 31675                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31676                                  
 31677                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31678                                  
 31679                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31680                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31681                                  GetHexNum:
 31682 00002A37 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31683 00002A39 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31684                                  ghn_next:
 31685 00002A3B 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31686 00002A3E 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31687 00002A41 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31688 00002A43 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31689 00002A46 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31690 00002A48 50                      	push	ax
 31691 00002A49 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31692 00002A4B E83706                  	call	delim
 31693 00002A4E 58                      	pop	ax
 31694                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31695 00002A4F B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31696 00002A52 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31697 00002A54 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31698                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31699                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31700 00002A57 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31701                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31702                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31703                                  ghn_shift1:
 31704 00002A59 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31705 00002A5B D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31706 00002A5D E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31707 00002A5F 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31708 00002A61 46                      	inc	si
 31709 00002A62 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31710                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31711 00002A64 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31712 00002A67 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31713 00002A6A F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31714 00002A6E 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31715                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31716                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31717                                  ghn_shift2:
 31718 00002A70 F8                      	clc
 31719 00002A71 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 31720 00002A73 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 31721 00002A75 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 31722 00002A77 F8                      	clc
 31723 00002A78 C3                      	retn
 31724                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31725                                  ghn_err:
 31726                                  gnib_err:
 31727 00002A79 F9                      	stc
 31728                                  ghn_ret:
 31729                                  gnib_ret:
 31730 00002A7A C3                      	retn

 31734                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 31735                                  ;
 31736                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 31737                                  ;
 31738                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 31739                                  ;
 31740                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 31741                                  ;

 31750 00002A83 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 31751 00002A85 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 31752 00002A88 C3                      	retn
 31753                                  is_it_hex:

 31759 00002A91 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 31760 00002A93 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc

 31851                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31852                                  ;
 31853                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 31854                                  ;
 31855                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 31856                                  ;
 31857                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 31858                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 31859                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 31860                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 31861                                  ;				NC
 31862                                  ;			  else 
 31863                                  ;				CY
 31864                                  ;
 31865                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 31866                                  ;
 31867                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31868                                  
 31869                                  umb_allocate:
 31870                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31871                                  	; ds = cs
 31872 00002AD8 50                      	push	ax
 31873 00002AD9 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 31874 00002ADB BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 31875                                  					;   possible
 31876                                  	; 31/12/2022

 31878                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 31879                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 31880                                  					; the largest UMB
 31881 00002AE2 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 31882 00002AE4 740D                    	jz	short ua_err
 31883                                  	
 31884 00002AE6 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 31885                                  
 31886                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31887 00002AE8 FF1E[FF1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 31888                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 31889                                  
 31890 00002AEC 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 31891 00002AEF 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 31892                                  	;clc
 31893                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31894                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31895                                  	; cf=0
 31896                                  	;clc 
 31897                                  ua_done:
 31898 00002AF1 58                      	pop	ax
 31899 00002AF2 C3                      	retn
 31900                                  ua_err:

 31902 00002AF4 EBFB                    	jmp	short ua_done
 31903                                  
 31904                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31905                                  ;
 31906                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 31907                                  ;
 31908                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 31909                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 31910                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 31911                                  ;			; DS = data
 31912                                  ;
 31913                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 31914                                  ;
 31915                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 31916                                  ;
 31917                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31918                                  
 31919                                  umb_insert:
 31920 00002AF6 1E                      	push	ds
 31921                                  
 31922                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31923                                  	; ds = cs
 31924                                  
 31925                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 31926 00002AF7 8E1E[161F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 31927                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 31928 00002AFB 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 31929 00002AFF 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 31930 00002B01 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31931                                  ui_next:
 31932 00002B03 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 31933                                  					;    new block
 31934 00002B05 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 31935                                  					; Q: is current block the
 31936                                  					;    last
 31937 00002B07 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31938 00002B0D 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 31939                                  					; N: get next block
 31940 00002B0F 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 31941                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 31942 00002B11 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31943 00002B14 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 31944                                  
 31945                                  ui_insert:
 31946 00002B16 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 31947 00002B18 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 31948                                  
 31949 00002B19 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 31950 00002B1B F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 31951                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 31952 00002B1D C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31953                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 31954 00002B22 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31955                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 31956 00002B28 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 31957                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 31958 00002B2C C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31959                                  
 31960                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 31961                                  
 31962 00002B32 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 31963 00002B34 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31964 00002B3A 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 31965                                  					; mark as free
 31966 00002B41 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 31967                                  					; start & end of new block
 31968 00002B44 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 31969                                  
 31970                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 31971                                  	
 31972 00002B49 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 31973 00002B4B 43                      	inc	bx
 31974 00002B4C 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 31975 00002B4E 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 31976                                  
 31977                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 31978                                  					; this block
 31979 00002B4F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 31980                                  	
 31981 00002B51 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31982 00002B57 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31983 00002B5E 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 31984 00002B62 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31985                                  
 31986 00002B69 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 31987                                  
 31988                                  ui_append:
 31989                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 31990 00002B6B 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 31991 00002B70 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 31992                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 31993                                  					; block for the next arena.
 31994                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31995 00002B76 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31996                                  
 31997 00002B7C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 31998 00002B7E 40                      	inc	ax
 31999 00002B7F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32000                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32001 00002B81 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32002                                  
 32003 00002B83 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32004                                  
 32005 00002B85 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32006 00002B8B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32007 00002B92 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32008 00002B96 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32009                                  
 32010                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32011 00002B9D 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32012 00002B9F 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32013 00002BA5 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32014                                  					; mark as free
 32015 00002BAC 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32016 00002BAD 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32017                                  ui_done:
 32018                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32019 00002BB2 1F                      	pop	ds
 32020                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32021                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32022 00002BB3 C3                      	retn
 32023                                  
 32024                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32025                                  
 32026                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32027                                  ;
 32028                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32029                                  ;
 32030                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32031                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32032                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32033                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32034                                  ;
 32035                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32036                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32037                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32038                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32039                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32040                                  ;
 32041                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32042                                  
 32043                                  umb_coalesce:
 32044                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32045                                  	; ds = cs
 32046 00002BB4 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32047                                  
 32048 00002BB5 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32049                                  
 32050                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32051                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32052 00002BB7 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32053 00002BBB 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32054                                  uc_nextfree:
 32055 00002BC0 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32056 00002BC2 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32057                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32058 00002BC4 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32059 00002BC9 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32060                                  					; N: get next arena
 32061 00002BCB E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32062 00002BCE 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32063 00002BD0 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32064                                  uc_again:
 32065 00002BD2 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32066 00002BD5 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32067                                  uc_check:
 32068 00002BD7 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32069 00002BDC 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32070                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32071 00002BDE 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32072 00002BE3 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32073                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32074 00002BE4 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32075 00002BE8 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32076 00002BEB 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32077 00002BED EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32078                                  
 32079                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32080                                  ;uc_done:
 32081                                  	;retn
 32082                                  
 32083                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32084                                  ;
 32085                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32086                                  ;
 32087                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32088                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32089                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32090                                  ;
 32091                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32092                                  
 32093                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32094                                  get_next:
 32095 00002BEF 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32096 00002BF4 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32097                                  _get_next_:
 32098 00002BF6 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32099 00002BF8 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32100 00002BFC 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32101 00002BFD 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32102                                  	;clc
 32103                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32104                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32105                                  	; cf=0
 32106                                  	;clc
 32107 00002BFF C3                      	retn
 32108                                  gn_err:
 32109 00002C00 F9                      	stc
 32110                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32111                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32112 00002C01 C3                      	retn
 32113                                  
 32114                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32115                                  ;
 32116                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32117                                  ;
 32118                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32119                                  
 32120                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32121                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32122                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32123                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32124                                  	; ds = cs
 32125 00002C02 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32126 00002C05 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32127                                  
 32128                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32129                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32130                                  
 32131                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32132                                  	; ds = cs
 32133                                  
 32134 00002C07 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32135 00002C09 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32136 00002C0B D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32137

 32140

 32142                                  
 32143 00002C13 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32144 00002C16 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32145

 32147 00002C1E 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32148                                  					
 32149 00002C25 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax

 32151

 32153

 32155 00002C32 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32156 00002C38 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0

 32166                                  					;  data segment with the arena

 32173 00002C55 31FF                    	xor	di,di

 32208                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32209                                  ;
 32210                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32211                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32212                                  ;
 32213                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32214                                  
 32215                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32216                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32217                                  	; ds = cs
 32218 00002C76 833E[F91E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32219                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32220 00002C7B 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32221 00002C7D 06                      	push	es
 32222 00002C7E 53                      	push	bx
 32223                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32224                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32225                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32226                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32227 00002C7F 8B1E[FD1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32228 00002C83 2B1E[F91E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32229 00002C87 8E06[F91E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32230                                  	
 32231 00002C8B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32232 00002C8E CD21                    	int	21h
 32233                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32234                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32235                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32236 00002C90 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32237 00002C92 48                      	dec	ax
 32238 00002C93 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32239 00002C95 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32240 00002C9C 5B                      	pop	bx
 32241 00002C9D 07                      	pop	es
 32242                                  su_exit:
 32243 00002C9E C3                      	retn

 32256 00002C9F 1E                      	push	ds

 32260                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32261 00002CA6 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32262                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32263 00002CA8 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32264                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32265 00002CAC 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32266 00002CB1 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32267                                  ulu_next:
 32268 00002CB6 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32269 00002CB9 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32270 00002CBB 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32271 00002CBD 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32272 00002CBF 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32273 00002CC1 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32274                                  ulu_found:
 32275                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32276 00002CC3 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32277                                  ulu_x:

 32279 00002CC9 1F                      	pop	ds

 32282                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32283                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32284                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32285                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32286                                  
 32287                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32288                                  ;
 32289                                  ; Summary:
 32290                                  ;
 32291                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32292                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32293                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32294                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32295                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32296                                  ;
 32297                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32298                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32299                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32300                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32301                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32302                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32303                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32304                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32305                                  ;
 32306                                  ; Example:
 32307                                  ;
 32308                                  ;   [menu]
 32309                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32310                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32311                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32312                                  ;
 32313                                  ;   [network]
 32314                                  ;   include misc
 32315                                  ;   device=foo
 32316                                  ;
 32317                                  ;   [misc]
 32318                                  ;   device=bar
 32319                                  ;   include alternate
 32320                                  ;
 32321                                  ;   [alternate]
 32322                                  ;   device=tar
 32323                                  ;
 32324                                  ;
 32325                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32326                                  ;
 32327                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32328                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32329                                  ;
 32330                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32331                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32332                                  ;   following order:
 32333                                  ;
 32334                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32335                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32336                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32337                                  ;
 32338                                  
 32339                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32340                                  
 32341                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32342                                  
 32343                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32344                                  
 32345                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32346                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32347                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32348                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32349                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32350                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32351                                  
 32352                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32353                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32354                                  
 32355                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32356                                  
 32357                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32358                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32359                                  
 32360 00002CCB 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 32361

 32364                                  ; procedure : setparms
 32365                                  ;
 32366                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 32367                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 32368                                  ;
 32369                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32370                                  
 32371                                  setparms:
 32372 00002CCC 1E                      	push	ds
 32373 00002CCD 50                      	push	ax
 32374 00002CCE 53                      	push	bx
 32375 00002CCF 51                      	push	cx
 32376 00002CD0 52                      	push	dx
 32377                                  
 32378 00002CD1 0E                      	push	cs
 32379 00002CD2 1F                      	pop	ds
 32380                                  
 32381 00002CD3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32382 00002CD5 8A1E[0E37]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 32383                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32384 00002CD9 43                      	inc	bx
 32385                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 32386                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 32387 00002CDA BA[E635]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 32388 00002CDD B444                    	mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 32389 00002CDF B00D                    	mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 32390 00002CE1 B508                    	mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 32391 00002CE3 B140                    	mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 32392 00002CE5 CD21                    	int	21h
 32393                                  
 32394                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32395                                  ;
 32396                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 32397                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 32398                                  ;	; 21/10/2022

 32401                                  ;
 32402                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32403                                  ;	jz	short not_ec35

 32409 00002CEC 7411                    	jz	short eot_ok
 32410

 32412                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32413 00002CEE 8A0E[0E37]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 32414 00002CF2 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32415 00002CF5 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax	
 32416                                  
 32417 00002CF7 B001                    	mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 32418 00002CF9 D2E0                    	shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 32419                                  	;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 32420 00002CFB 0806[3105]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 32421

 32423                                  ;

 32426                                  ;;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 32427                                  ;

 32433                                  ;	mov	[EOT],al
 32434                                  
 32435                                  eot_ok:

 32437 00002D00 59                      	pop	cx
 32438 00002D01 5B                      	pop	bx
 32439 00002D02 58                      	pop	ax

 32456 00002D08 C706[EA35]5000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 32457                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+1],2
 32458 00002D0E C606[E735]02            	mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_3INCH720KB ; 2
 32459                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 32460 00002D13 C706[E835]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0

 32466                                  %if 0

 32469                                  
 32470                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32471                                  ;
 32472                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32473                                  ;
 32474                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32475                                  ;
 32476                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32477                                  
 32478                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32479                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32480                                  
 32481                                  parseline:
 32482                                  	push	ds
 32483                                  
 32484                                  	push	cs
 32485                                  	pop	ds
 32486                                  
 32487                                  nextswtch:
 32488                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32489                                  	je	short done_line
 32490                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32491                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32492                                  
 32493                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32494                                  
 32495                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32496                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32497                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 32498                                  	je	short getparm
 32499                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32500                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32501                                  
 32502                                  getparm:
 32503                                  	call	check_switch
 32504                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32505                                  	jc	short swterr
 32506                                  getnext:
 32507                                  	call	getchr
 32508                                  	jc	short done_line
 32509                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 32510                                  swterr:
 32511                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32512                                  
 32513                                  done_line:
 32514                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32515                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32516                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32517                                  	jnz	short okay
 32518                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32519                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32520                                  
 32521                                  okay:
 32522                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 32523                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32524                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32525                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32526                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32527                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32528                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32529                                  	; cf=0
 32530                                  	;clc
 32531                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 32532                                  exitpl:
 32533                                  	pop	ds
 32534                                  	retn
 32535                                  put_back:
 32536                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32537                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32538                                  	jmp	short done_line
 32539                                  
 32540                                  %endif
 32541                                  
 32542                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32543                                  ;
 32544                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32545                                  ;
 32546                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32547                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32548                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32549                                  ; error.
 32550                                  ;
 32551                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32552                                  
 32553                                  check_switch:
 32554 00002D21 E817FA                  	call	getchr
 32555                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32556 00002D24 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32557 00002D26 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32558 00002D28 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32559                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32560 00002D2A 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32561 00002D2C 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 32562 00002D2E 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 32563                                  
 32564 00002D30 06                      	push	es
 32565                                  
 32566 00002D31 0E                      	push	cs
 32567 00002D32 07                      	pop	es
 32568                                  
 32569 00002D33 8A0E[A237]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 32570 00002D37 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32571 00002D39 BF[A337]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 32572 00002D3C F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32573                                  
 32574 00002D3E 07                      	pop	es
 32575 00002D3F 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32576                                  
 32577 00002D41 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32578 00002D44 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32579 00002D46 8B1E[0F37]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32580 00002D4A 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32581 00002D4C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32582                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32583 00002D4E A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 32584                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 32585 00002D50 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 32586                                  
 32587 00002D52 E8E6F9                  	call	getchr
 32588 00002D55 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 32589                                  
 32590 00002D57 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32591 00002D59 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 32592                                  
 32593 00002D5B E8DDF9                  	call	getchr
 32594 00002D5E 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 32595                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32596                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 32597                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32598                                  	; ds = cs
 32599 00002D5F C606[2A03]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 32600 00002D64 E8D803                  	call	getnum
 32601                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 32602                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32603 00002D67 C606[2A03]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 32604 00002D6C 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 32605                                  
 32606                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 32607                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 32608                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 32609                                  
 32610 00002D6D E80500                  	call	process_num
 32611                                  
 32612                                  done_swtch:
 32613                                  	;clc
 32614                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32615                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32616                                  	; cf=0
 32617                                  	;clc
 32618 00002D70 C3                      	retn
 32619                                  
 32620                                  err_swtch:
 32621 00002D71 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 32622                                  err_check:
 32623 00002D73 F9                      	stc
 32624                                  err_chk:
 32625 00002D74 C3                      	retn
 32626                                  
 32627                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32628                                  ;
 32629                                  ; procedure : process_num
 32630                                  ;
 32631                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 32632                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 32633                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 32634                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 32635                                  ;
 32636                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32637                                  
 32638                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32639                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 32640                                  process_num:
 32641 00002D75 850E[0F37]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 32642 00002D79 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.

 32713                                  ;
 32714                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32715                                  ;
 32716                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32717                                  ;
 32718                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32719                                  
 32720                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32721                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32722                                  parseline:
 32723                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32724                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 32725                                  
 32726                                  	;push	ds ; *
 32727                                  
 32728                                  	;push	cs ; *
 32729                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 32730                                  
 32731                                  nextswtch:
 32732 00002DA7 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32733 00002DA9 741C                    	je	short done_line
 32734 00002DAB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32735 00002DAD 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32736                                  
 32737                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32738                                  
 32739 00002DAF 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32740 00002DB1 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32741 00002DB3 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 32742 00002DB5 7402                    	je	short getparm
 32743 00002DB7 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32744                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32745                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32746                                  swterr:
 32747 00002DB8 C3                      	retn
 32748                                  
 32749                                  getparm:
 32750 00002DB9 E865FF                  	call	check_switch
 32751 00002DBC 891E[0F37]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32752 00002DC0 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 32753                                  getnext:
 32754 00002DC2 E876F9                  	call	getchr
 32755                                  	;jc	short done_line
 32756                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 32757                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32758 00002DC5 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 32759                                  ;swterr:
 32760                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32761                                  
 32762                                  done_line:
 32763                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32764 00002DC7 F606[0F37]08            	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32765                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32766 00002DCC 750C                    	jnz	short okay
 32767 00002DCE F9                      	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32768                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32769                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32770 00002DCF C3                      	retn
 32771                                  
 32772                                  ;exitpl:
 32773                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32774                                  	; ds = cs
 32775                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 32776                                  	;retn
 32777                                  
 32778                                  put_back:
 32779 00002DD0 FF06[D203]              	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32780 00002DD4 FF0E[D603]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32781 00002DD8 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 32782                                  
 32783                                  okay:
 32784 00002DDA A1[0F37]                	mov	ax,[switches]
 32785 00002DDD 83E003                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32786 00002DE0 A3[E835]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32787 00002DE3 C706[0C36]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32788                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32789                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32790                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32791                                  	; cf=0
 32792                                  	;clc
 32793                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 32794                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32795                                  	;jmp	short setdeviceparameters
 32796                                  
 32797                                  %endif

 32801                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32802                                  ;
 32803                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 32804                                  ;
 32805                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 32806                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 32807                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 32808                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 32809                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 32810                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 32811                                  ;
 32812                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 32813                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 32814                                  ;
 32815                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 32816                                  ;
 32817                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32818                                  
 32819                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32820                                  
 32821                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32822                                  setdeviceparameters:
 32823                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32824                                  	; ds = cs
 32825                                  	
 32826 00002DE9 06                      	push	es
 32827                                  
 32828 00002DEA 0E                      	push	cs
 32829 00002DEB 07                      	pop	es
 32830                                  
 32831 00002DEC 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32832 00002DEE 8A1E[E735]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 32833 00002DF2 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32834 00002DF5 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 32835                                  
 32836 00002DF7 C706[EA35]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32837                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 32838                                  got_80:
 32839 00002DFD D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 32840 00002DFF 8BB7[8E37]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 32841                                  
 32842                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 32843                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32844 00002E03 BF[ED35]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 32845 00002E06 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 32846 00002E09 FC                      	cld
 32847                                  	;repe	movsb
 32848                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32849 00002E0A F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 32850                                  
 32851 00002E0C 07                      	pop	es
 32852                                  
 32853                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32854 00002E0D F606[0F37]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32855                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32856 00002E12 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 32857                                  
 32858 00002E14 A1[0C37]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 32859                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 32860 00002E17 A3[FA35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 32861                                  
 32862                                  see_heads:
 32863                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32864 00002E1A F606[0F37]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32865                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32866 00002E1F 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 32867                                  
 32868 00002E21 A1[0A37]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 32869                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 32870 00002E24 A3[FC35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 32871                                  
 32872                                  heads_not_altered:
 32873                                  
 32874                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 32875                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 32876                                  
 32877                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 32878                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32879                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 32880                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32881 00002E27 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 32882 00002E2A A2[EF35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 32883                                  
 32884 00002E2D B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 32885                                  
 32886                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 32887                                  
 32888                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 32889                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32890 00002E2F 8A3E[F735]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 32891                                  
 32892                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32893                                  	; ax = 2
 32894 00002E33 3906[FC35]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 32895                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 32896 00002E37 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 32897                                  
 32898 00002E39 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 32899                                  
 32900                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 32901                                  
 32902 00002E3B 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 32903                                  
 32904                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 32905                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 32906                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 32907                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 32908                                  
 32909                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 32910                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 32911                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 32912                                  
 32913 00002E3D 833E[FA35]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 32914 00002E42 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 32915 00002E44 833E[EA35]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 32916 00002E49 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 32917                                  
 32918                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 32919                                  
 32920 00002E4B EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32921                                  
 32922                                  ;	check for 320K
 32923                                  
 32924                                  not_144m:
 32925 00002E4D 833E[EA35]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32926 00002E52 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32927 00002E54 833E[FA35]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32928 00002E59 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32929                                  
 32930 00002E5B B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 32931 00002E5D EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 32932                                  
 32933                                  only_one_head:
 32934                                  
 32935                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 32936                                  
 32937 00002E5F 803E[E735]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32938 00002E64 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32939                                  
 32940                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 32941                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 32942                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 32943                                  
 32944 00002E66 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 32945 00002E68 833E[FA35]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32946                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32947 00002E6D 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 32948                                  
 32949 00002E6F B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 32950                                  
 32951                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 32952                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 32953                                  
 32954                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 32955                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32956                                  	; ax = 2
 32957 00002E71 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 32958 00002E72 A2[EF35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 32959                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 32960                                  
 32961                                  got_correct_mediad:
 32962 00002E75 881E[F735]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 32963                                  
 32964                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 32965                                  
 32966 00002E79 A1[EA35]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 32967 00002E7C F726[FC35]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 32968 00002E80 F726[FA35]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 32969 00002E84 A3[F535]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 32970 00002E87 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 32971                                  
 32972 00002E88 C3                      	retn
 32973                                  
 32974                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine
