 32993                                  ;

 32995                                  ;;   because we the case of values in SET commands preserved
 32996                                  ;
 32997                                  ;	call	mapcase

 32999                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33000 00002E8F E81B02                  	call	mapcase
 33001                                  
 33002 00002E92 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 33003 00002E94 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33004 00002E96 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax

 33012                                  org1:
 33013 00002E9B E8B101                  	call	skip_comment
 33014 00002E9E 740D                    	jz	short end_commd_line	; found a comment string and skipped.
 33015 00002EA0 E89601                  	call	get2			; not a comment string. then get a char.
 33016 00002EA3 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf ; 0Ah
 33017 00002EA5 7406                    	je	short end_commd_line	; starts with a blank line.
 33018 00002EA7 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' ; 20h

 33020 00002EAB EB0A                    	jmp	short findit
 33021                                  
 33022                                  end_commd_line:
 33023 00002EAD AA                      	stosb				; store line feed char in buffer for the linecount.
 33024                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset the command level.

 33026                                  	; ds = cs
 33027 00002EAE C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 33028 00002EB3 EBE6                    	jmp	short org1
 33029                                  
 33030                                  nochar1:
 33031 00002EB5 F9                      	stc
 33032 00002EB6 C3                      	retn
 33033                                  
 33034                                  findit:
 33035 00002EB7 51                      	push	cx
 33036 00002EB8 56                      	push	si
 33037 00002EB9 57                      	push	di
 33038 00002EBA 89F5                    	mov	bp,si
 33039 00002EBC 4D                      	dec	bp
 33040 00002EBD BE[5535]                        mov     si,comtab		; prepare to search command table
 33041 00002EC0 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 33042                                  findcom:
 33043 00002EC2 89EF                    	mov	di,bp
 33044 00002EC4 8A0C                    	mov	cl,[si]
 33045 00002EC6 46                      	inc	si
 33046 00002EC7 E324                    	jcxz	nocom
 33047                                  
 33048                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33049                                  
 33050                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33051                                  ;
 33052                                  ;;   Simplify future parsing by collapsing ";" onto "REM", and at the same
 33053                                  ;;   time skip the upcoming delimiter test (since ";" need not be followed by
 33054                                  ;;   anything in particular)
 33055                                  ;
 33056                                  ;       cmp     byte [es:di],CONFIG_SEMICOLON  ; ';'
 33057                                  ;       je	short semicolon
 33058                                  ;loopcom:
 33059                                  ;       mov     al,[es:di]
 33060                                  ;       inc     di
 33061                                  ;       and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; force upper case
 33062                                  ;       inc     si                      ; compare to byte @es:di
 33063                                  ;       cmp     al,[si-1]
 33064                                  ;       loope   loopcom
 33065                                  ;;else
 33066                                  ;;	repe	cmpsb
 33067                                  ;endif
 33068                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33069 00002EC9 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 33070                                  
 33071 00002ECB 9F                      	lahf
 33072 00002ECC 01CE                            add     si,cx                   ; bump to next position without affecting flags
 33073 00002ECE 9E                      	sahf
 33074 00002ECF AC                              lodsb                           ; get indicator letter
 33075 00002ED0 75F0                    	jnz	short findcom
 33076 00002ED2 26803D0D                        cmp     byte [es:di],cr		; the next char might be cr,lf
 33077 00002ED6 7410                    	je	short gotcom0 		; such as in "rem",cr,lf case.
 33078 00002ED8 26803D0A                	cmp	byte [es:di],lf
 33079 00002EDC 740A                    	je	short gotcom0
 33080                                  
 33081                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33082                                  ;
 33083                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33084                                  ;
 33085                                  ;;   Skip the delimiter test for the BEGIN identifier (it doesn't have one).
 33086                                  ;
 33087                                  ;       cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN  ; '['
 33088                                  ;       je	short gotcom0
 33089                                  ;;endif
 33090                                  ;	push	ax
 33091                                  ;       mov     al,[es:di]		; now the next char. should be a delim.
 33092                                  ;
 33093                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33094                                  ;
 33095                                  ;;   If keyword is *immediately* followed by a question mark (?), then
 33096                                  ;;   set the high bit of the ASCII command code (CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY) that is
 33097                                  ;;   stored in the CONFIG.SYS memory image.
 33098                                  ;
 33099                                  ;       cmp     al,'?'                  ; explicit interactive command?
 33100                                  ;       jne	short no_query		; no
 33101                                  ;       pop     ax                      ; yes, so retrieve the original code
 33102                                  ;       or      al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ; and set the QUERY bit

 33106                                  ;       jmp     short gotcom0
 33107                                  ;no_query:

 33445                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33446                                  ;
 33447                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 33448                                  ;
 33449                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 33450                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 33451                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 33452                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 33453                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 33454                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 33455                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 33456                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 33457                                  ;
 33458                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33459                                  
 33460                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33461                                  
 33462                                  skip_comment:
 33463 0000304F E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 33464                                  
 33465                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33466                                  	; ds = cs	
 33467                                  
 33468 00003051 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33469                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 33470 00003056 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 33471                                  
 33472 00003058 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 33473                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 33474 0000305D 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33475                                  
 33476 0000305F 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33477                                  	
 33478 00003062 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33479                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33480 00003066 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33481                                  
 33482 00003068 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33483                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33484 0000306D 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33485                                  
 33486 0000306F 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33487                                  	
 33488 00003073 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33489                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33490 00003077 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33491                                  skip_cmmt:
 33492 00003079 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33493 0000307B 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33494 0000307E 46                      	inc	si
 33495 0000307F 49                      	dec	cx
 33496 00003080 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33497 00003082 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33498                                  no_commt:
 33499 00003084 C3                      	retn

 33501                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33502                                  %if 0
 33503                                  
 33504                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33505                                  
 33506                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33507                                  ;
 33508                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33509                                  ;
 33510                                  ;   INPUT
 33511                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33512                                  ;
 33513                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33514                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33515                                  ;
 33516                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33517                                  ;       All
 33518                                  ;
 33519                                  ;   HISTORY
 33520                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33521                                  ;
 33522                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33523                                  
 33524                                  kbd_read:
 33525                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33526                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33527                                  
 33528                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33529                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33530                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33531                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33532                                  kbd_loop:
 33533                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 33534                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33535                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33536                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33537                                          int     16h             ;
 33538                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33539                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33540                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33541                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33542                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33543                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33544                                  
 33545                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 33546                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33547                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33548                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33549                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33550                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33551                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33552                                          int     16h             ;
 33553                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33554                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33555                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 33556                                          inc     bx
 33557                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33558                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33559                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33560                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33561                                          int     16h             ;
 33562                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 33563                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33564                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33565                                  
 33566                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33567                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33568                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33569                                  	
 33570                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33571                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33572                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33573                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33574                                          call    print
 33575                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33576                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 33577                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33578                                  kbd_notf5:
 33579                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33580                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33581                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33582                                  
 33583                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33584                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33585                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33586                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33587                                          call    print           ;
 33588                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33589                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33590                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33591                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 33592                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33593                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33594                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 33595                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33596                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33597                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33598                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33599                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33600                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33601                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33602                                          retn			;
 33603                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33604                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33605                                          retn			;
 33606                                  
 33607                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33608                                  ;
 33609                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33610                                  ;
 33611                                  ;   INPUT
 33612                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33613                                  ;
 33614                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33615                                  ;       None
 33616                                  ;
 33617                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33618                                  ;       None
 33619                                  ;
 33620                                  ;   HISTORY
 33621                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33622                                  ;
 33623                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33624                                  
 33625                                  set_numlock:
 33626                                          push    ax
 33627                                          push    ds
 33628                                          sub     ax,ax
 33629                                          mov     ds,ax
 33630                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33631                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33632                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 33633                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33634                                          jmp     short set_done
 33635                                  not_off:
 33636                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 33637                                          stc
 33638                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 33639                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 33640                                  set_done:
 33641                                          pop     ds
 33642                                          pop     ax
 33643                                          retn
 33644                                  
 33645                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33646                                  
 33647                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33648                                  ;
 33649                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 33650                                  ;
 33651                                  ;   INPUT
 33652                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 33653                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 33654                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33655                                  ;
 33656                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33657                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 33658                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 33659                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 33660                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 33661                                  ;
 33662                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33663                                  ;       All
 33664                                  ;
 33665                                  ;   NOTES
 33666                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 33667                                  ;
 33668                                  ;   HISTORY
 33669                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33670                                  ;
 33671                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33672                                  
 33673                                  menu_check:
 33674                                  
 33675                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 33676                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 33677                                  
 33678                                          push    cx              ;
 33679                                          push    si              ;
 33680                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 33681                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 33682                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33683                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 33684                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33685                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 33686                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 33687                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33688                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 33689                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33690                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 33691                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 33692                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 33693                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 33694                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 33695                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33696                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 33697                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 33698                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 33699                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 33700                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 33701                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 33702                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 33703                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 33704                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 33705                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 33706                                          call    get_char        ;
 33707                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 33708                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 33709                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 33710                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33711                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33712                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 33713                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 33714                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 33715                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 33716                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33717                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 33718                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33719                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 33720                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 33721                                          pop     si              ;
 33722                                          pop     cx              ;
 33723                                  
 33724                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 33725                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 33726                                  
 33727                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33728                                          jnz	short menu_search
 33729                                  ;
 33730                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 33731                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 33732                                  ;
 33733                                          call    kbd_read
 33734                                          jnc	short menu_search
 33735                                          jmp	menu_abort
 33736                                  
 33737                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 33738                                  
 33739                                  menu_search:
 33740                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 33741                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 33742                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 33743                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 33744                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 33745                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 33746                                  
 33747                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 33748                                  
 33749                                  menu_color:
 33750                                          push    cx              ;
 33751                                          push    dx              ;
 33752                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 33753                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 33754                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 33755                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 33756                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 33757                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33758                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 33759                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 33760                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 33761                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 33762                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 33763                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 33764                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 33765                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 33766                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33767                                  check_color:                    ;
 33768                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 33769                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 33770                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 33771                                  set_color:
 33772                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 33773                                          pop     dx              ;
 33774                                          pop     cx              ;
 33775                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 33776                                  
 33777                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 33778                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 33779                                  
 33780                                  menu_found:
 33781                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 33782                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 33783                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 33784                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 33785                                  
 33786                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 33787                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 33788                                  
 33789                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 33790                                  
 33791                                  menu_process:
 33792                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33793                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 33794                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 33795                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 33796                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 33797                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 33798                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 33799                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 33800                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 33801                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 33802                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 33803                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 33804                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 33805                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33806                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 33807                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 33808                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33809                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 33810                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33811                                          stc                     ;
 33812                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 33813                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33814                                  menu_numlock:
 33815                                          call    set_numlock
 33816                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33817                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 33818                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 33819                                  
 33820                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 33821                                  
 33822                                  menu_default:
 33823                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 33824                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 33825                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 33826                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 33827                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 33828                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 33829                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 33830                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 33831                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 33832                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 33833                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 33834                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 33835                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 33836                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 33837                                  timeout_skip:
 33838                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33839                                  
 33840                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 33841                                  
 33842                                  menu_item:
 33843                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 33844                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 33845                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 33846                                          call    srch_block      ;
 33847                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 33848                                          stc                     ;
 33849                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 33850                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 33851                                  
 33852                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 33853                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 33854                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 33855                                  
 33856                                  menu_itemfound:
 33857                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 33858                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 33859                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 33860                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 33861                                  
 33862                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 33863                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 33864                                  ;   description...
 33865                                  
 33866                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 33867                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 33868                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 33869                                          call    skip_token      ;
 33870                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33871                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 33872                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33873                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 33874                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 33875                                  
 33876                                  menu_nextitem:
 33877                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33878                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 33879                                  
 33880                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 33881                                  
 33882                                  menu_getdefault:
 33883                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 33884                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 33885                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 33886                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 33887                                  menu_valid:
 33888                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 33889                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 33890                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 33891                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 33892                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 33893                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 33894                                  menu_chkdefault:
 33895                                          push    bx              ;
 33896                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 33897                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33898                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 33899                                          push    ds              ;
 33900                                          push    es              ;
 33901                                          pop     ds              ;
 33902                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 33903                                          pop     ds              ;
 33904                                          pop     bx              ;
 33905                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 33906                                          inc     bx              ;
 33907                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 33908                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 33909                                  menu_nodefault:
 33910                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 33911                                  menu_setdefault:
 33912                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 33913                                  
 33914                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 33915                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 33916                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 33917                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 33918                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 33919                                  ;   with no timeout)
 33920                                  
 33921                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 33922                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 33923                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 33924                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 33925                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 33926                                  
 33927                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 33928                                  
 33929                                  menu_display:
 33930                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 33931                                          int     10h             ;
 33932                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 33933                                          int     10h             ;
 33934                                          push    es              ;
 33935                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 33936                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 33937                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 33938                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 33939                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 33940                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 33941                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 33942                                          int     10h             ;
 33943                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 33944                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 33945                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 33946                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 33947                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 33948                                  	dec     dl              ;
 33949                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 33950                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 33951                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 33952                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 33953                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 33954                                  menu_clear:
 33955                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 33956                                          pop     es              ;
 33957                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 33958                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 33959                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 33960                                  
 33961                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33962                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 33963                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33964                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 33965                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 33966                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 33967                                          int     10h             ;
 33968                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 33969                                          call    print           ;
 33970                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 33971                                          int     10h             ;
 33972                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 33973                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 33974                                  
 33975                                  menu_nostatus:
 33976                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 33977                                  menu_disploop:
 33978                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 33979                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 33980                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 33981                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 33982                                  
 33983                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 33984                                  
 33985                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 33986                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 33987                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 33988                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33989                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 33990                                          int     10h             ;
 33991                                  
 33992                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 33993                                          call    print           ;
 33994                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 33995                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 33996                                          call    print           ;
 33997                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 33998                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33999                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 34000                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 34001                                  
 34002                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 34003                                  
 34004                                  menu_autoselect:
 34005                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 34006                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 34007                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 34008                                  menu_abort:
 34009                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 34010                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 34011                                  
 34012                                  normal_boot:
 34013                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 34014                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 34015                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 34016                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34017                                          jmp     menu_search
 34018                                  
 34019                                  not_topmenu:
 34020                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34021                                          jne	short not_submenu
 34022                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34023                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34024                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 34025                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34026                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 34027                                          jmp     menu_found
 34028                                  
 34029                                  not_submenu:
 34030                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 34031                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34032                                  
 34033                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 34034                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 34035                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 34036                                  
 34037                                  no_selection:
 34038                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 34039                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 34040                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34041                                          push    ds              ;
 34042                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 34043                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34044                                  
 34045                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 34046                                  ;
 34047                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 34048                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 34049                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 34050                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 34051                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 34052                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 34053                                  ;
 34054                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 34055                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 34056                                  
 34057                                  copyblock_loop:
 34058                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 34059                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 34060                                          pop     bx              ;
 34061                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34062                                  
 34063                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 34064                                  
 34065                                  copyblock_begin:
 34066                                          push    ax              ;
 34067                                          push    cx              ;
 34068                                          push    si              ;
 34069                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 34070                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34071                                          push    ds              ;
 34072                                          push    cs              ;
 34073                                          pop     ds              ;
 34074                                          call    comp_names      ;
 34075                                          pop     ds              ;
 34076                                          pop     di              ;
 34077                                          pop     si              ;
 34078                                          pop     cx              ;
 34079                                          pop     ax              ;
 34080                                          je	short copyblock_check
 34081                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 34082                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 34083                                          push    di              ;
 34084                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 34085                                          push    ds              ;
 34086                                          push    es              ;
 34087                                          pop     ds              ;
 34088                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 34089                                          pop     ds              ;
 34090                                          pop     di              ;
 34091                                  copyblock_check:
 34092                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34093                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 34094                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34095                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 34096                                  
 34097                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 34098                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 34099                                          call    get_char        ;
 34100                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34101                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34102                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34103                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 34104                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 34105                                  ;
 34106                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 34107                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 34108                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 34109                                  ;
 34110                                  move_config:
 34111                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 34112                                          push    cx              ;
 34113                                  ;
 34114                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 34115                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 34116                                  ;
 34117                                   	;mov	cx,7
 34118                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 34119                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 34120                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 34121                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 34122                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 34123                                  copy_boot: 
 34124                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 34125                                          cs
 34126                                  	lodsb
 34127                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 34128                                          inc     di              ;
 34129                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 34130                                  
 34131                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 34132                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 34133                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 34134                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 34135                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 34136                                          push    cs              ;
 34137                                          pop     es              ;
 34138                                          mov     si,szCommon
 34139                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 34140                                          call    any_delim       ;
 34141                                          je	short l2	;
 34142                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34143                                          inc     si              ;
 34144                                          inc     di              ;
 34145                                          loop    l1              ;
 34146                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 34147                                          pop     es              ;
 34148                                  
 34149                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 34150                                  
 34151                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34152                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34153                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34154                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 34155                                  
 34156                                          push    cx              ;
 34157                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 34158                                          pop     cx              ;
 34159                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 34160                                          pop     ds              ;
 34161                                  
 34162                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 34163                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 34164                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 34165                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 34166                                  ;   is empty.
 34167                                  
 34168                                          push    es              ;
 34169                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34170                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 34171                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 34172                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34173                                          pop     es
 34174                                  
 34175                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 34176                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 34177                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 34178                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 34179                                  
 34180                                  menu_done:
 34181                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 34182                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 34183                                          push    es              ;
 34184                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 34185                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34186                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 34187                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 34188                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 34189                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 34190                                          pop     es              ;
 34191                                  menu_exit:
 34192                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 34193                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 34194                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 34195                                          retn
 34196                                  
 34197                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34198                                  ;
 34199                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34200                                  ;
 34201                                  ;   INPUT
 34202                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 34203                                  ;
 34204                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34205                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 34206                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 34207                                  ;
 34208                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34209                                  ;       None
 34210                                  ;
 34211                                  ;   NOTES
 34212                                  ;       None
 34213                                  ;
 34214                                  ;   HISTORY
 34215                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34216                                  ;
 34217                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34218                                  
 34219                                  copy_envvar:
 34220                                          push    cx              ;
 34221                                          push    si              ;
 34222                                          push    ds              ;
 34223                                          push    es              ;
 34224                                          push    es              ;
 34225                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 34226                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 34227                                  
 34228                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 34229                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 34230                                  ;   config.sys line)
 34231                                  ;
 34232                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 34233                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 34234                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 34235                                  
 34236                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 34237                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 34238                                          lodsb                   ;
 34239                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 34240                                          stc                     ;
 34241                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 34242                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 34243                                          stc                     ;
 34244                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34245                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 34246                                          stc                     ;
 34247                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34248                                          inc     cx              ;
 34249                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 34250                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 34251                                          mov     al,0            ;
 34252                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 34253                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 34254                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 34255                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 34256                                  copy_varsrch:
 34257                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 34258                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 34259                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 34260                                          push    cx              ;
 34261                                          push    si              ;
 34262                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 34263                                          pop     si              ;
 34264                                          pop     cx              ;
 34265                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 34266                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 34267                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 34268                                  
 34269                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 34270                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 34271                                  
 34272                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34273                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 34274                                          push    si              ;
 34275                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34276                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 34277                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 34278                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 34279                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 34280                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 34281                                  
 34282                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 34283                                  	es	; 26h
 34284                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 34285                                  
 34286                                  	pop     si
 34287                                  copy_envprep:
 34288                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 34289                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 34290                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 34291                                          je	short copy_envdel
 34292                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34293                                  
 34294                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 34295                                          push    cx              ;
 34296                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34297                                          repne   scasb           ;
 34298                                          pop     cx              ;
 34299                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 34300                                  
 34301                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 34302                                          lodsb                   ;
 34303                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 34304                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34305                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 34306                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34307                                          stosb                   ;
 34308                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34309                                  
 34310                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 34311                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 34312                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 34313                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 34314                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 34315                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34316                                  
 34317                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 34318                                          pop     es              ;
 34319                                          pop     ds              ;
 34320                                          pop     si              ;
 34321                                          pop     cx              ;
 34322                                  
 34323                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34324                                          retn
 34325                                  
 34326                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34327                                  ;
 34328                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 34329                                  ;
 34330                                  ;   INPUT
 34331                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34332                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34333                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 34334                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 34335                                  ;
 34336                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34337                                  ;       Same as above
 34338                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 34339                                  ;
 34340                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34341                                  ;       All
 34342                                  ;
 34343                                  ;   NOTES
 34344                                  ;       None
 34345                                  ;
 34346                                  ;   HISTORY
 34347                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34348                                  ;
 34349                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34350                                  
 34351                                  copy_block:
 34352                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 34353                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 34354                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34355                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 34356                                          je	short copy_done ;
 34357                                  
 34358                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 34359                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 34360                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 34361                                  
 34362                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 34363                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 34364                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 34365                                  
 34366                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 34367                                          push    di              ;
 34368                                  
 34369                                          mov     di,szMenu
 34370                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 34371                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34372                                  
 34373                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34374                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 34375                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34376                                  
 34377                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 34378                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34379                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 34380                                          pop     di              ;
 34381                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 34382                                          push    cx              ;
 34383                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 34384                                          push    si              ;
 34385                                          dec     dx              ;
 34386                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 34387                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 34388                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 34389                                          pop     si              ;
 34390                                          pop     cx              ;
 34391                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 34392                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34393                                  
 34394                                  copy_skip:
 34395                                          pop     di
 34396                                  copy_error:
 34397                                          clc                     ;
