 35502                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35503                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35504                                  	mov     dx,' Y'
 35505                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35506                                  
 35507                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35508                                  
 35509                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35510                                  
 35511                                  
 35512                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35513                                  
 35514                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35515                                  ;
 35516                                  ; procedure : delim
 35517                                  ;
 35518                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35519                                  
 35520                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35521                                  ;
 35522                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35523                                  ;
 35524                                  ;any_delim:
 35525                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35526                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35527                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35528                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35529                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35530                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35531                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35532                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35533                                  ;
 35534                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35535                                  
 35536                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35537                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35538                                  delim:
 35539 00003085 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35540 00003087 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35541                                  
 35542 00003089 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35543 0000308B 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35544                                  
 35545                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35546 0000308D 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35547 0000308F 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35548 00003091 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35549 00003093 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35550 00003095 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35551 00003097 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35552 00003099 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35553 0000309B 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35554 0000309D 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35555                                  
 35556                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35557                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35558                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35559                                  ;	clc
 35560                                  ;;endif
 35561                                  
 35562                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35563                                  delim_ret:
 35564 0000309F C3                      	retn
 35565

 35568                                  ; procedure : newline
 35569                                  ;
 35570                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 35571                                  ;
 35572                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35573                                  
 35574                                  newline:
 35575 000030A0 E898F6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 35576 000030A3 7207                    	jc	short nl_ret

 35578 000030A7 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35579 000030A9 E88FF6                  	call	getchr
 35580                                  nl_ret:
 35581 000030AC C3                      	retn

 35585                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35586                                  ;
 35587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35588                                  
 35589                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35590                                  mapcase:
 35591 000030AD 51                      	push	cx
 35592 000030AE 56                      	push	si
 35593 000030AF 1E                      	push	ds
 35594                                  
 35595 000030B0 06                      	push	es
 35596 000030B1 1F                      	pop	ds
 35597                                  
 35598                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35599                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35600                                  ;
 35601                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35602                                  ;;else
 35603                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35604                                  ;;endif
 35605                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35606 000030B2 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35607                                  
 35608                                  convloop:
 35609 000030B4 AC                      	lodsb
 35610 000030B5 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35611 000030B7 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35612 000030B9 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35613 000030BB 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35614 000030BD 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35615 000030BF 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35616                                  noconv:
 35617                                  
 35618                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35619                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35620                                  ;;
 35621                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35622                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35623                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35624                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35625                                  ;;
 35626                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35627                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35628                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35629                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35630                                  ;check_eol:
 35631                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35632                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35633                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35634                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35635                                  ;;endif
 35636                                  	
 35637                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35638 000030C2 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35639                                  convdone:
 35640 000030C4 1F                      	pop	ds
 35641 000030C5 5E                      	pop	si
 35642 000030C6 59                      	pop	cx
 35643 000030C7 C3                      	retn
 35644                                  
 35645                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35646                                  ;
 35647                                  ; procedure : round
 35648                                  ;
 35649                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35650                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35651                                  ;
 35652                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35653                                  
 35654                                  round:
 35655 000030C8 50                      	push	ax
 35656 000030C9 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35657                                  
 35658 000030CD E8F1DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35659                                  
 35660 000030D0 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35661 000030D5 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35662 000030DC 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35663 000030E0 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35664 000030E5 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35665 000030E7 2EF606[3614]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35666 000030ED 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35667 000030EF 06                      	push	es
 35668 000030F0 56                      	push	si
 35669 000030F1 2E8B36[3414]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35670 000030F6 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35671 000030F8 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35672 000030FA 48                      	dec	ax
 35673                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35674 000030FB 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35675 000030FF 2E8026[3614]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35676 00003105 5E                      	pop	si
 35677 00003106 07                      	pop	es
 35678                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35679 00003107 58                      	pop	ax
 35680                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35681                                  	; cf = 0
 35682                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35683                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35684 00003108 C3                      	retn
 35685                                  
 35686                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35687

 35691 0000310A 1F                      	pop	ds
 35692                                  mem_err2:
 35693 0000310B BA[A938]                	mov	dx,badmem

 35696 0000310E E87602                  	call	print
 35697 00003111 E940D7                  	jmp	stall

 35725                                  todigit:

 35727                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 35728                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35729 00003139 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 35730                                  	;cmp	al,9
 35731                                  	;ja	short notdig
 35732                                  	;clc
 35733                                  	;retn
 35734                                  	; 12/12/2022

 35742                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35743                                  ;
 35744                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35745                                  ;
 35746                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35747                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35748                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35749                                  ;
 35750                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35751                                  
 35752                                  getnum:
 35753 0000313F 53                      	push	bx
 35754 00003140 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35755                                  b2:
 35756 00003142 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35757 00003145 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35758                                  
 35759 00003147 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35760 00003148 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35761                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35762                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35763 00003149 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 35764 0000314B F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 35765 0000314D 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 35766 0000314E 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 35767 00003150 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 35768 00003153 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 35769                                  
 35770 00003155 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 35771                                  
 35772 00003156 E8E2F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 35773 00003159 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 35774 0000315B 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 35775 0000315D 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 35776 0000315F 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 35777 00003161 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 35778 00003163 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 35779 00003165 7417                    	je	short b15
 35780 00003167 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 35781 0000316C 7410                    	je	short b15
 35782 0000316E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 35783                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 35784                                  	;nop
 35785                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35786                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35787                                  	;nop
 35788                                  	;nop
 35789 00003170 740C                    	je	short b15
 35790 00003172 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 35791 00003174 7408                    	je	short b15
 35792 00003176 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35793 00003178 7404                    	je	short b15
 35794 0000317A 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 35795 0000317C 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 35796                                  b15:
 35797 0000317E 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 35798 00003183 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 35799                                  b1:
 35800 00003188 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 35801 0000318A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 35802 0000318C 5B                      	pop	bx
 35803 0000318D C3                      	retn
 35804                                  badnum:
 35805                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35806                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35807 0000318E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 35808                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 35809 00003190 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 35810 00003194 5B                      	pop	bx
 35811 00003195 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 35812 00003196 C3                      	retn
 35813                                  
 35814                                  ;****************************************************************************
 35815                                  
 35816                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 35817                                  
 35818                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35819                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 35820                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 35821                                  ;	si = 0
 35822                                  ;	ax = country id
 35823                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 35824                                  ;	bx = file handle
 35825                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 35826                                  ;
 35827                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 35828                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 35829                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 35830                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 35831                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35832                                  
 35833 00003197 57                      	push	di
 35834 00003198 50                      	push	ax
 35835 00003199 52                      	push	dx
 35836                                  
 35837 0000319A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 35838 0000319C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 35839 0000319E B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 35840 000031A1 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 35841 000031A4 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35842                                  
 35843 000031A6 06                      	push	es
 35844 000031A7 56                      	push	si
 35845                                  
 35846 000031A8 0E                      	push	cs
 35847 000031A9 07                      	pop	es
 35848                                  
 35849 000031AA BF[CB34]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 35850 000031AD B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 35851 000031B0 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 35852                                  
 35853 000031B2 5E                      	pop	si
 35854 000031B3 07                      	pop	es
 35855 000031B4 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 35856                                  
 35857 000031B6 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 35858 000031B9 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 35859 000031BC 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 35860                                  
 35861 000031BE 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 35862 000031BF 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 35863 000031C1 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 35864 000031C4 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 35865 000031C7 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 35866 000031CA 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35867                                  
 35868 000031CC 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 35869 000031CE 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 35870 000031D2 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 35871                                  
 35872 000031D4 46                      	inc	si
 35873 000031D5 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 35874 000031D6 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 35875 000031D7 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 35876 000031D8 5F                      	pop	di
 35877                                  
 35878                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 35879 000031D9 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id

 35933 00003229 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35934

 35936 0000322E B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 35937 00003231 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 35938 00003233 F9                      	stc
 35939 00003234 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 35940 00003236 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 35941                                  
 35942 00003238 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 35943 0000323A 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 35944

 35959 00003259 F9                      	stc

 35961 0000325C 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail

 35963 0000325E 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx

 35972 00003270 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail

 35985

 35987

 36001 00003296 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]

 36051                                  ;input: al - data id

 36097                                  
 36098                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36099                                  
 36100                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36101                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36102                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36103                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36104                                  ;	 be moved.
 36105                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36106                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36107                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36108                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36109                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36110                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36111                                  
 36112 000032F3 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36113 000032F4 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36114 000032F7 F9                      	stc
 36115 000032F8 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36116 000032FA 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36117 000032FB 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36118                                  
 36119 000032FD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36120 000032FF 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36121 00003301 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36122 00003303 F9                      	stc
 36123 00003304 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36124                                  ricb_exit:
 36125 00003306 C3                      	retn

 36129                                  set_country_path:
 36130                                  
 36131                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36132                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36133                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36134                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36135                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 36136                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 36137                                  
 36138 00003307 56                      	push	si
 36139

 36155 00003319 CD21                    	int	21h
 36156 0000331B 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36157                                  
 36158                                  scp_setdrv:
 36159 0000331D 2EA2[8834]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36160 00003321 BF[8B34]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36161 00003324 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36162 00003326 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36163 00003328 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36164

 36166 0000332C 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36167

 36182

 36789                                  number3div	equ ($-SYSINIT$)
 36790                                  number3mod	equ (number3div % 16)
 36791

 36793 0000395E 00<rep 2h>              		times (16-number3mod) db 0
